1.content:
Shawn Rowe turned to his alarm clock and hit the snooze button for the 5th time. He was in no mood to get up. Shawn stared up to the ceiling of his small one room apart in LA and thought to himself what he was doing with his life.

Shawn had moved to LA just over a year ago to pursue his dream of being a big time Hollywood stuntman. There was nothing he loved more in life than to feel the rush of adrenaline as he would light himself on fire, or jump from the top of a building, or fighting off a wave of ninja warriors. He’d loved the idea of it since he was a child and knew he had the capabilities of doing it. Heck he had advantages that nobody else in the world had.

You see, when Shawn was in high school he discovered he had the ability to shapeshift. The only limit was his imagination. He used the powers to do the usual things a teenager would do, buff himself up without the workout, make himself just a few inches taller, sneak into the girls locker room under a variety of different personas. But after he got all of that out of his system he realized he could actually do things that could make his dreams come true. So after he graduated from college, he moved to LA where the first thing he did was make contact with his cousin Rebecca. He’d heard tales from his family about the ‘black sheep’ of the family who moved to LA and became a big time Hollywood producer. Unfortunately this was not the case. Rebecca was just a lowly intern at a casting company and she saw no signs of a promotion coming her way.

Little did she know a golden goose was about to fall into her lap when her cousin Shawn came into her apartment one day and turned himself into an exact copy of her. After Shawn calmed her down and explained his powers to her she saw a plan for the future and quit immediately and started the Perry Casting Agency with her one and only client who just happened to be just whatever a casting agent needed.

But this happened over year ago, and outside of a few bit roles as random henchmen on some kids tv shows, a skydiving buxom brunette for a commercial for a crummy website, and even on one occasion a curling playing dog for a straight to dvd movie that didn’t even get released. Nothing was happening for Shawn, he barely had enough to pay for ramen.

Shawn was beginning (and not for the first time) contemplate just moving back home and taking over the family business, when all of the sudden his cell phone rang. Picking up the phone and seeing it was Rebecca he slowly answered, “Your favorite unemployed client speaking.”

“Not for long you’re not,” Rebecca said excitedly, “I just got you your first major gig!”

“That’s what you said with the curling dog fiasco.”

“Forget about that, I got you your first major stunt role and a real life, honest to God, actually getting released in theaters film!”

“Really!” Shawn said suddenly awake, “What is it! Who will I be doing work for!”

“You’re being hired to be the stunt double for…”
1.title: The starving artist finds a bone

choices: Oh Shawn I was just messing with you
I already called the studio about a female role
I already called the studio about an animal role
11.content:
Shawn let out a very audible sigh of relief upon here the news he actually gets to stay a man for his next job. Rebecca obviously heard, "I take it you like this news?"

"You have no idea how glad I am to here you say that, it's a really nice relief that I don't have to spend an extended amount of time as a girl or a dog or something. I get to be a guy and do what I love. This is the sort of thing I pictured happening when I came out here, thanks a ton Becca. You're a saint." Shawn praised to a now silent other end of the phone line.

"Time as a girl or a dog or something?" Rebecca repeated sounding more and more agitated, "So being a girl is just as bad as being a four legged animal or some other unspeakable horror?"

"What? No! Of course not! It's just that I prefer being a guy you know."

"So being a guy is so much better than being a girl!" Rebecca said with a little bit of a shriek to her voice.

"Now, you're just being irrational." Shawn knew he shouldn't have said that the second it had left his mouth.

"Irrational am I!? Well, I was being courteous to you by offering you a job as a male stuntman, but I have other offers for other roles that I thought would be beneath or degrading to you, but I think I'll call them up and sign you up for something. Enjoy the next shoot in heels, or maybe a nice leash." With that Rebecca slammed the phone down (which was particularly effective as you don't need to do that with a smart phone like she has). Shawn immediately dialed his cousin back hoping to convince her to come to her senses and not sign him up for something that he was going to be miserable doing. Finally after calling her back for about a eighth time she picked up the phone.

"Please please tell me you didn't sign me up for me to be a a...stunt stripper or something. I'm really sorry for what I said. It was stupid and poorly worded." Shawn anxiously waited to here his cousin's response.
11.title: Be careful what you say to your agent

111.content:
Shawn heard the sound of Rebecca's almost maniacal laughter on the other end of the call making him more and more nervous. He was on the edge of his seat waiting for a response when he managed to make out Rebecca saying between cackles, "I was haha just screwing with you. heehee I never called any studio. Oh I wish I could see the look on your face."

"So so I'm still doing stunts for a leading man?" Shawn said softly as his heart beating hard in his chest hoping she wasn't just playing with him further.

"Of coarse you are silly. What kind of psycho would I have to be to turn down a leading man stunt double role for you just for the pettiest of petty revenges. Do you have any idea how much money and reputation building I'd be throwing away? I'd never do that to you...at least not yet" Rebecca ended the sentence with some more evil laughter.

"Okay I admit it Becca, you got me, you scared the hell out of me. Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to try to sleep off that heart attack you just gave me."

"Aren't you forgetting about something?"

"I don't think so."

"The job."

"The job!" Shawn said, in all the panic he had forgotten about the real reason Rebecca had called in the first place. "Please tell me it's something cool, after what you just did to me it had better be."

"Don't worry, you'll be stunting for the lead who is playing the part of..."

1123.title: Rebecca wants a meeting

12.content:
Shawn felt his giddiness rise while at the same time felt his heart sink down into his chest. “The leading actress, that’s great.” Shawn said failing to hide his disappointment.

“Shawn, what’s wrong? Did you not hear me? You got a job. A good one! One that will make it so you can actually maybe afford cable again.”

“I know.”

“Besides, after that commercial shoot as that brunette I distinctly remember you enjoying yourself in the role.”

Shawn could practically hear her grinning through the phone, “W-well that was just a few hours worth of shooting, this will involve me being a woman on probably an almost everyday basis for some time. Are you sure that you couldn’t have gotten me a guy role?”

“Look.” Rebecca said her voice suddenly becoming very stern. “I had to call up every single contact I’ve made in this vacuum of kindness of a town and then I called them all again and again until finally I found a friend of a friend of a friend who was willing to put her reputation on the line to put my reputation on the line to get you hired. If you don’t want this job then you can just…”

“Whoa whoa easy their Becca, I’m sorry. I’ll stop the bitching. Promise.”

“Good,” Rebecca said obviously trying to calm herself down. “If I could have gotten you a guy role I would have, but that wasn’t available. Besides, it’s harder to find a good stuntwoman in this town, you’ll surely get more pay and probably more jobs out of this.”
“Well, that is good I guess.”

“It is good, now let me tell you about the part, you’ll be doing stunts for the leading lady in...”

1211.content:
"...Batwoman."

"Batwoman?"

"Yeah, Shawn. Is that a problem? I mean, I know you like Batman and all, so I thought this would be the closest you would get to playing him."

With a heavy sigh and a shake of his head, Shawn answered Rebecca.

"Fine. That's fine."

"Shawn, you DO know that this is likely to be a big hit at the box office, right? They're not doing the campy 1950's version, they're doing the Greg Rucka and J.H Williams III Batwoman. It's quality stuff, Shawn. I have the graphic novel right here in front of me."

"It's not that, Becca. I just think that Lady Luck hates me."

Shawn could here Rebecca laughing over the phone.

"Dude, you're going to make a bundle on this project. If the movie is successful and becomes a franchise, do you have any idea how famous this will make us?"

Shawn had a fantasy of swimming in a pool full of greenbacks.

"Fine...fine. What does the actress look like?"

"I'll send you a picture of the main actress in costume after I hang up so you can get yourself ready and to help psych yourself up. I'll be there at this first meeting but after that you're off to go practice stunts and shoot the film and you'll be on your own for the most part."

"When's the first meeting?"

"Today at 5 PM."

"TODAY! Jesus Becca, you could have given me two days notice."

"We don't have two days notice. Shooting begins next week!"

"Fine. Thanks for everything Becca, you're a life saver."

"I know." Rebecca said, "Good luck cousin, and remember to not make yourself into an exact twin of the main actress, just similar enough to satisfy the director."

The cousins said their goodbye as Shawn went to the bathroom to get ready for the day while he waited for the picture. He brushed his teeth and with an unusual vigor as he just stared down at his phone until finally it gave off a chime meaning he'd gotten the text. He finished gargling some mouthwash and picked up his phone to take a look at the form he'd have to base a body off of.

121122.content:
After adding a few slight modifications to the actresses' face(a slightly more bulbous nose, a slightly darker shade of blonde hair, brown eyes instead of blue) and body(slightly more fit, less soft), Shawn admired himself in the mirror before deciding to go to the gym. He looks in his closet for his spare sets of women's clothing, and pulls out a simple T-Shirt with the design of a famous jazz musician on it and some yoga pants.

At the gym, he spends a good three hours there working on cardio and lifting weights. There are an equal mix of men and women with him at the gym, but Shawn has other things on his mind besides trying to get dates(such as trying to pay the bills). At the end of his routine, Shawn gets a message on his cell from Rebecca.

"Shawn, the audition schedule has been bumped to 4:00 P.M! Stop by the studio office right away. I'm already there."

"Oh great" said Shawn to himself. He looked at the time. It was 3:30 P.M. How was he going to do this with running a red light?

"Oh well, I guess I'll just have to risk it."

Shawn ran out the gym doors, jumped into his car, and sped down the congested streets as fast as his car could. Making use of side streets, he barely managed to get there five minutes before the meeting. His heart was pumping, he was sweaty, and he looked like a hot mess. How was he going to impress these bigwigs now?!

Nervously, he went inside of the huge building of glass and went up to the secretary in the lobby and before he could even say anything the secretary bluntly asked, "You the stunt girl for the 5:00 meeting?". A little thrown off by the harshness. Shawn simply nodded his head. "Through the elevator doors, go to the 8th floor to room 802. They're waiting on you."

Not wanting to keep them waiting any longer Shawn followed the no nonsense secretary's orders and after receiving some more directions from a very friendly (and probably horny) janitor, he made his way to the meeting room. The first thing Shawn felt upon entering the room was under-dressed. In the room was a youngish(Shawn guessed maybe a year or two older than him) attractive Mexican man in a dapper suit behind a table, and in front of the table were two chairs, one of which was occupied by Rebecca. The man stood up and extended his hand to Shawn, "Ms. Dowe, I'm the director Alexi Salazar . I'd like to thank you for agreeing to be a part of our film."

"It's no problem whatsoever." Shawn says assuming that he was the Ms. Dowe. Looking to Rebecca he saw her flash a message on her phone when Alexi was sitting down that simply said 'Shelly Dowe'. Well, it's nice to know this body's name, Shawn thought as he sat down. "Now, Ms. Dowe, you were given this interview because your agent here assured us that you would be able to perform whatever stunts we require without question."

"That is correct sir." Shawn said confidently.

"Fantastic, now if you could please show me your stunt reel."

"Excuse me?" Shawn said confused.

"Your stunt reel, you didn't expect me to just hand you a contract without seeing a stunt reel. I mean you do have the look but I can't just hire you based on look alone, we're going to have some dangerous stunts going on with realistic weapons and real fire. I have to know you won't be a liability. Now if you could show me your stunt reel."

"I was not told this. We need time to prepare one." Rebecca said clearly flustered at this news.

"Is this some sort of joke Ms. Perry? I was giving your client this chance partially as a favor and you don't even have the basic knowledge of what you're doing? What kind of scam are you running?" Alexi said to Rebecca practically dressing her down verbally.

"I...I'm not..." Rebecca was so shaken she could hardly speak. Seeing his cousin in trouble Shawn stood up and walked to the door. "Excuse me Ms. Dowe. Where are you going?"

"You'll see." Shawn said angrily, he walked down the hall and grabbed the mop the janitor was using and walked back into the meeting. Before Artie could ask what he was doing with the mop Shawn broke the mop over his knee and then proceeded to do a minute long choreographed fight scene that with his body really looked like a beautifully dangerous dance. He ended the 'scene' by throwing each end of the mop right by each of the director's ears. Shawn just stood there calmly while his heart raced hoping he'd taken the right approach. The director gulped and meekly said, "You're hired." As he pushed the final contract to Rebecca and Shawn's end of the table. "You start next week, you'll be learning the stunts for a week before we start filming the scenes you are stunting for."

"Thank you very much Mr. Fowler." Shawn said as he signed Shelly Dowe on the dotted line and made his way to the door.

***

At Rebecca's "office" later on(8:00 PM):

Shawn and Rebecca eat pizza while going over the finer points of the job the former just signed up for.

"So who is this chick I'm stunting for anyway?"

"Her name is Phoebe Pfister" answered Rebecca. "She's been in a few well regarded indie movies as well as some theater, and now she wants to spread her wings by trying out a big budget film."

"How old is she, about 19?"

"Nah, she's the same age as you."

"Well I've never heard of her."

"You don't have the money to see a lot of movies, Shelly."

"Touche."

"Thanks again for all of this, Becca."

"No problem. So what do you want to do afterwards? Go home?"

"Nah, I'm bored. You think of something, and I'll tag along."

"How about a celebratory drink for your first major job?"

Being a shapeshifter had a lot of perks. Specifically for his line of work Shawn could make his body whatever he wanted to get a job. Unfortunately each of those bodies had to create their own bank account that would take direct deposit since most movie studio's didn't deal in straight cash. So every few months Shawn as whoever his new body was would create a new account, a few weeks later close it and withdraw all the cash, and then eventually deposit most of the money in his normal Shawn account. It was a pain in the butt, but it Shawn figured it was worth it. So with the sun setting 'Shelly Dowe' created an account at First National Bank of Hollywood and left. But as he and Rebecca were leaving and the bank was getting ready to close, he noticed three men in hoodies hiding their face rudely shove Rebecca on their way into the bank. Shawn turned to have words with the jerks but when he turned he saw the three had drawn guns on the workers of the bank.

"I can do something." Shawn said determinedly.

12311.content:
Shawn was never the biggest art guy in school, but it was when he was 'crafting' his own 'artwork' he could really see how those art majors could get really sucked into the details of their work. He kept going back to the picture and the actress' measurements (which Rebecca had sent soon after the picture) to make himself look as much like the actress as possible. Shawn spent a hour going over each and every section of his body bit by bit crafting it to look like the actress he was stunting for, Maria Solana. Finally after molding the rest of his body he finally took care of his manhood. It was always the part he looked least forward to when it came to shapeshifting into a woman, but he knew that it was also a big detail that he couldn't just overlook. So, reluctantly, Shawn closed his eyes and shifted his male genitals into a female vagina. He was still wearing his muscle shirt and short pants (which were now hanging very loosely off of him now) so he didn't see this change, but he sure didn't need to see it to know what was going on under those pants. After turning and looking at his reshaped body from all the angles in the mirror Shawn said to nobody in particular, "Okay, time to put on my own personal touches."

As much as he was sure the studio would love the idea of Maria's stunt double looking exactly like her, Shawn knew that if he showed up as her clone it would get really weird. And maybe even a little suspicious although perhaps that was just paranoia sneaking in. So he cranked up his height 2 inches to a nice 5'9". He also added some muscle tone, especially to his arms and stomach. Shawn smiled at this, it was one of his favorite perks of this ability, all the workout results without any of the work. Shawn spent another few minutes posing in front of the full length mirror deciding on what he wanted to do next. Shawn decided to do some work on his face and moved his cheekbones a little higher up and shrunk his ears a little. Looking at the picture of Maria again he noticed that her lips were probably injected with collagen and the breasts seemed to have been enhanced a bit, so deciding he wasn't that kind of girl shrunk each of them down a little making his lips nice and thin and his breasts went from a large D to a still sizable C. Then decided he could still do a little bit more to differentiate himself from Maria, Shawn also added a little beauty mark just below his left eye.

"This is some of my best work yet." Shawn said doing some more poses into the mirror and blew a kiss to himself before he walked away to find some workout clothes so he can practice moving around and working up a sweat in this body.
12311.title: Fine tuning the blonde bombshell form

123112.content:
Shawn came back to his apartment at 3 after a few hours of working out at the gym. He'd put himself through all of the paces. He did some running, weight lifting, and gave himself a little treat by joining in on a women's yoga class. And after showering at the gym with some of his yoga friends he came back home to get ready for his meeting.

Shawn opened up his closet and groaned at his wardrobe. After going through everything he owned, including the few women's outfits he owned, he came to the realization that he didn't own anything that fit. "Looks like I'm going to have to go shopping after the meeting." Shawn said to himself while thinking of his poor credit card and the hit it was about to take. After searching and trying on a lot of clothes for an hour he finally found a pair of his old black khakis from when he was younger that would work with a tight belt and a white blouse that he owned when he was a woman, although with his current woman's body the blouse was too small but it actually showed off his body nicely so he decided to grin and bear it.

He took a look at himself in the mirror, and while the clothes made him look passably professional his face and hair was a different story. Thankfully his previous experiences as a female had given him some experience with basic makeup and hair styling, although he looked at his clock and saw it was already 4:30 so he could only do some basic things like a touch of makeup for color and a scrunchy so he could keep his blonde locks out of his eyes. Grabbing his wallet and an apple for the road Shawn left for the meeting where he'd hopefully get his first big stunt job set in stone.
123112.title: Post workout getting ready for the meeting

choices: Studio B just accross the street
New Zealand.  Here is your ticket.
1231122.content:
Shawn sped his vehicle all the way down to the office where Rebecca had told him the meeting was taking place. He went inside of the huge building of glass and went up to the secretary in the lobby and before he could even say anything the secretary bluntly asked, "You the stunt girl for the 5:00 meeting." A little thrown off by the harshness Shawn simply nodded his head. "Through the elevator doors, go to the 8th floor to room 802. They're waiting on you."

Not wanting to keep them waiting any longer Shawn followed the no nonsense secretary's orders and after receiving some more directions from a very friendly (and probably horny) janitor, he made his way to the meeting room. The first thing Shawn felt upon entering the room was under-dressed. In the room was a large bald man in a suit behind a table, and in front of the table were two chairs, one of which was occupied by Rebecca. The bald man stood up and extended his hand to Shawn, "Ms. Dowe, I'm the director Artie Fowler. I'd like to thank you for agreeing to be a part of our film."

"It's no problem whatsoever." Shawn says assuming that he was the Ms. Dowe. Looking to Rebecca he saw her flash a message on her phone when Artie was sitting down that simply said 'Shelly Dowe'. Well, it's nice to know this body's name, Shawn thought as he sat down. "Now, Ms. Dowe, you were given this interview because your agent here assured us that you would be able to perform whatever stunts we require without question."

"That is correct sir." Shawn said confidently.

"Fantastic, now if you could please show me your stunt reel."

"Excuse me?" Shawn said confused.

"Your stunt reel, you didn't expect me to just hand you a contract without seeing a stunt reel. I mean you do have the look but I can't just hire you based on look alone, we're going to have some dangerous stunts going on with realistic weapons and real fire. I have to know you won't be a liability. Now if you could show me your stunt reel."

"I was not told this. We need time to prepare one." Rebecca said clearly flustered at this news.

"Is this some sort of joke Ms. Perry? I was giving your client this chance partially as a favor and you don't even have the basic knowledge of what you're doing? What kind of scam are you running?" Artie said to Rebecca practically dressing her down verbally.

"I...I'm not..." Rebecca was so shaken she could hardly speak. Seeing his cousin in trouble Shawn stood up and walked to the door. "Excuse me Ms. Dowe. Where are you going?"

"You'll see." Shawn said angrily, he walked down the hall and grabbed the mop the janitor was using and walked back into the meeting. Before Artie could ask what he was doing with the mop Shawn broke the mop over his knee and then proceeded to do a minute long choreographed fight scene that with his body really looked like a beautifully dangerous dance. He ended the 'scene' by throwing each end of the mop right by each of the director's ears. Shawn just stood there calmly while his heart raced hoping he'd taken the right approach. The director gulped and meekly said, "You're hired." As he pushed the final contract to Rebecca and Shawn's end of the table. "You start next week, you'll be learning the stunts for a week before we start filming the scenes you are stunting for."

"Thank you very much Mr. Fowler." Shawn said as he signed Shelly Dowe on the dotted line and made his way to the door before he remembered an important detail. "So, where exactly do I go for this?"

"Sorry about that." Artie said, "Well Shelly we'll be doing the filming in..."
1231122.title: Shawn has to prove him erm..herself

choices: they ask him and he can
they ask him and he can't
12311222.content:
„Wow, thanks, I have never been there“ Shawn said taking the ticket and having a closer look on the departure date, which was tomorrow.
“less time to pack things and prepare” was the next statement.
“Yes, but will manage it. So see you in one week in New Zeeland. Just don’t forget to take the instruction package from my secretary. There is the plot of the film and some details where and when you have to be present. Good trip, Ms. Dowe.” Said the director and Shawn and Rebecca realized that this was the moment where they were expected to leave his office.
They did so and even when Shawn wished that this could be avoided they had to go to this incompetent and awful secretary again to get the instruction package…
In her professional attitude, the same she showed before the meeting she handed some package to Shawn and also wished a good trip, but this was not meant honest..
Rebecca and Shawn didn’t care about her any longer, they had no time, since the flight will be very soon…
Leaving the studio building Rebecca said: “We could discuss our plan while having a dinner, I know some nice and not to expensive restaurant nearby. You like Chinese, Shawn…?”
Of course he liked Chinese, Rebecca knows that, but currently he has mixed emotions and thoughts running through his now pretty female head…
But at the end not only the stunt reel caused a feeling of hunger with Shawn and he agreed to go there with her adding: “I assume you are paying?”. Rebecca nodded, because that was only a small favor what she could do for her cousin.
They walked down the road and entered the nice small Chinese restaurant with the name “Golden duck”. They were greeted by a friendly Chinese girl and guided to her seats. At this time the restaurant started to fill and they were lucky to get one of the last empty tables.
“Can’t you come with me?” said Shawn after a while of absolute silence.
“I wish I could, but the tickets and hotel are only paid for you, or for Shelly Dowe…” she answered sadly, because she also thought about joining her cousin on that trip…
Suddenly Shawn had an idea: ”That guy you pay for creating some fake passports for me from time to time, maybe he can also fake a flight ticket?”
12311222.title: New Zealand.  Here is your ticket.

123112222.content:
"He wanted how much for your fake plane ticket and hotel reservation!" Shawn said to Rebecca after she handed him 'Shelly's' passport.

"He wanted way too much. More than I could afford. Apparently they're really tricky on short notice and I suspect he thought he could take advantage of the situation. So I'm sorry Shawn, you're going to have to be on your own. Think you can handle it?"

"Hey I'm a big boy I can handle it." Shawn said, although he was really disappointed that Rebecca wouldn't be joining him. "Besides, it probably would have looked suspicious if my agent came with me on a job."

"I guess so," Rebecca said, "Oh well, we can make up for our time apart with our girl's day out tomorrow."

"Yeah...wait what?" Shawn said, he had been about to go to his bathroom to change from Shelly to Shawn when these words had stopped him in his tracks.

"Well, yeah. You've seen your ticket, your flight leaves tomorrow night at 11, that's just over 24 hours and you don't have a single outfit that will fit you, you're practically falling out of what you're wearing now. Shawn, you're going to be in New Zealand for weeks, you can't just wear the same blouse and khakis over and over again."

"I was going to pack some sweats." Shawn said in as meek a defiant voice as he had.

"That won't do cousin. You're going to need a few full on outfits. And we should also get you a nice dress or two with some heels. There's a chance that Shelly will get invited to some formal events while on the job."

"Oh come on Becca, I can just..."

"Don't you 'Oh come on Becca' me. I've been in this business alot longer than you have, you're going to need some nice clothes. So, you get to sleep now and I'll be here bright and early so we can hit as many places as possible. Then we'll come back here and I'll help you pack. Ooo you're probably going to need some cute luggage."

"And how do we afford all this?"

"Your first paycheck will be in the 'Shelly' account I created today as of midnight, we're going to be spending just about all of it tomorrow, but I'm sure you can live off of hotel and catered meals until the next one."

"Great." Shawn said, he'd actually been looking forward to getting a new tv and sound system for himself.

"It'll be fun, besides we can take some pictures and such, it's been a while since I've had a girls day out and I suspect it's been a while since you've had one." Rebecca said as she grabbed Shawn's camera and took a kissy face picture of the two standing side by side. Shawn was still not very amused. "Oh come on, you weren't even smiling." Becca said going back to the pictures before pausing. "Shawn...why do you have a naked picture of youself."

Shawn grabbed the camera from Rebecca, "It's for reference for when I transform back into this form, I need to get all the details right."

"So all of those poses were just...reference."

"Yeah," said Shawn while his face turned bright red.

"Sure they are. You get some sleep with your...references. I expect to see Shelly out in front of your apartment bright and early."
123112222.title: Shawn will have to go it alone

choices: "I'd like to get to know my roomate."
"If I hadn't picked you up I'd be fired."
1231122222.content:
The next 24 hours were a blur for Shawn. He tried to get right to be but as much as he tried to sleep he could never get himself comfortable. It was weird for him, as many times as he'd been a different person, he'd never gone to sleep as a woman before. After hours and hours of tossing and turning Shawn finally found a comfortable postion and managed to shut his eyes for a nice long sleep. At least that's what he'd hoped for, Shawn's alarm went off on hour later to wake him up for his busy day shopping. As soon as he woke up he went downstairs in his zombie like state and was dragged from store to store for hours on end trying on skirts, dresses, and blouses. And once that was done Rebecca took Shawn to even more stores to get some fitted bras, new panties, and even a swimsuit for 'Shelly'. To top it all off Rebecca got a set of matching luggage that looked 'so adorable' and the two packed up all of the cloths they just purchased for 'Shelly' and soon they were off to the airport. Shawn really wanted to complain but really just felt too tired to and just nodded and grumbled a bit whenever Rebecca talked to him. The next thing he knew Rebecca giving him a hug and practically pushing him onto his plane where the nice flight attendant led him to his seat where he finally found the sweet embrace of dreamland.

A long trip and many bad on flight movies later Shawn woke up and looked out the window to see a land of green below him. Shawn was about to wake up a fellow passenger and ask questions when the pilot announced over the intercom, "We are now making our final decent, please fasten your seat belts and place your food trays in the upright and locked position."

Sheesh, how long was I out? Shawn thought to himself, but he shrugged it off and just sat back and enjoyed the decent into the beautiful country. As soon as they'd landed, Shawn grabbed his two carry on bags and went to the luggage carousel to grab his 2 large suitcases of clothes. He eventually grabbed them and managed to lug all of his stuff to the outside where he could hail down a cab, but before he could he noticed a sign that had his, (well Shelly's) name on it. "Are you here for me?" Shawn asked the pretty lady holding the sign.

"Yes, my name's Kia Libbi. I'm here to take you to the crew meeting. Here, let me help you with those." Kia said reaching out to put Shawn luggage into a van. Kia was a very attractive 5'7" olive skinned and black haired woman who had a nice curvy figure. "Thanks," Shawn said after subtly checking out Kia and opening up the end of the vehicle. It was full of a lot of very nice looking fabrics which Shawn made sure to be careful with as he put in his stuff up. Getting into the van Shawn asked, "So what do you do with the production?"

"I'm one of the seamstresses on the crew. I needed to go out and get some materials today and I was volunteered to pick you up."

"Oh, sorry about that. I could have gotten a cab or my own rental car."

"I couldn't let you do that, besides...
1231122222.title: Arriving in New Zealand

choices: Post meeting back at the appartment
12311222221.content:
"Ohhhh" Shawn let out, "I didn't know I was getting a roommate." This news was not very welcome and Kia seemed to read that.

"Did you not know? Wasn't it in your packet? It was in mine."

"I...actually haven't gotten a chance to read it, I only got it yesterday," Shawn said kind of sheepishly.

"Well, you might want to read that, we've got a couple of hours on the road from the airport to the meeting."

The two sat there in silence for the next half hour while Shawn poured over his information packet. It was mostly stuff that he'd expected, standard contract information, tax forms, and finally a small booklet with a few rules and bits of info. Including the information about Kia being his roommate. Shawn was just kicking himself mad about his situation. He was really looking forward to finally having time alone so he could have some 'Shawn time'. But now with a roommate finding time to just be himself just got more complicated. Kia seemed to have noticed Shawn's annoyance at the situation, "I'm sorry about this, but unless you want to pay for your own room you're stuck with me. Sorry that I'm in your way."

"No it's not that, it's just that I wasn't expecting it and that's my fault. I was just looking forward to having room to work out and stuff." Seeing that Kia still seemed to have hurt feelings Shawn continued, "I'm really looking forward to having you as a roomie. We'll have fun," Shawn said with as sincere a smile as he could muster.

Kia looked at Shawn and gave a much more sincere looking smile of her own, "It's okay, I'm sorry, I overreacted to what you said. I can get a little over emotion sometimes, you know how it is." Shawn didn't know how it is but nodded in agreement, "You're right, we'll have a lot of fun on the job. Hey, I've got an idea! How about we work out together. You're in such great shape and you could help me out. That is if you don't mind."

"That sounds great!" Shawn faked enthusiastically, "Just great."
12311222221.title: "I'd like to get to know my roomate."

choices: Venting and trying on costumes with Kia
123112222211.content:
Shawn spent the rest of the ride to the hotel reading through the script with it's production notes. Shawn was very happy to see that it seemed he would only be needed for two scenes, the big fight scene at the end and a scene where Princess Aida (Maria's character) was burned at the steak for an evil sacrifice but eventually saved by a spell from a wizard. Shawn wasn't looking forward to burning in a dress but this was all good news. The shoot was supposedly for 3 weeks and these two scenes would take two, three, maybe four days tops. If he was lucky he could get his full pay and be back in LA in a week. It was with this happy mindset that Shawn entered his production meeting with Kia at his side.

The meeting was in a large rounded room with about 100 people sitting and chatting about until the the director showed up to tell everybody what the agenda was. Everyone was there, actors, technicians, and everything in between. Shawn sat next to Kia near the back so they could get a head start on traffic after the meeting was done. After a few minutes of smalltalk mostly involving Shawn telling Kia about his life with a few minor modifications, the director burst into the room in a coat of flop sweat. At this the room fell dead silent, after all when the boss enters the room looking like that it's just about always a bad sign. Breathing a little heavily Mr. Fowler stood in front of the room and said, "There's no need to worry, no need to panic. Everything is fine. Everything is perfectly on schedule." Nobody believed this for a minute as everyone awaited for the other shoe to drop. "But I just got off the phone with Ms. Solana has been delayed on the shoot of another movie and won't be here for at least a week possibly two." A wave of panicked whispered took over the room. A voice shouted out, "Can't we just delay shooting for two weeks." But another voice shouted angerly in reply, "No way in hell, that would cost millions unless they chose not to pay us and that sure as hell isn't happening."

"Please please! Everyone please calm down!" Artie Fowler shouted at the top of his lungs finally getting the attention of the room again. "Now, I've spent the last few hours going over the script shot by shot and I think there is a way we can work around this. Maria's stunt double looks remarkably like her, and I think with some trick photography and a little bit of paid overtime by out special effects department, she could stand in for Maria in a few scenes."

This news seemed to calm everyone in the room down at least a little except for one former man who simply raised his long nailed hand and said, "Excuse me?"

"Ah, Ms. Dowe you're here. Ladies and gentlemen this is Shelly Dowe who will be a savior to this production." A round of applause and handshakes set upon Shawn who tried to muster a protest against this idea. It would mean he'd probably have to be in New Zealand for the full 3 weeks and would probably be stuck as 'Shelly' most of, if not all of, the time. "I see you are a little flustered at having this thrust upon you, but I assure you that your salary will be tripled at the very least for your troubles. So will you accept? This entire production, and a lot of jobs including your own are dependent on you."

Shawn sat in stunned silence, he was outraged that he was practically being blackmailed into this position. "I guess I don't really have a choice," Shawn said a bit bitterly, "I'll do it." Everyone breathed a sigh of relief knowing the production would continue. "That's the spirit Ms. Down! Let's have a round of applause for Shelly," the director said leading the crowd. Shawn smiled and gave a polite wave to everyone which lasted a minute before Mr. Fowler quieted it down. "Now this has all put us on a very tight schedule. Kia! Since you will be spending a good deal of time with Shelly away from the set, I'm assigning you to her costume fitting in 30 minutes, we have to make sure she can fit into all of Maria's costumes before shooting begins tomorrow. Now everybody, let's all stay positive and all do good work," Artie said dismissing everyone. It took all of his self control to stop Shawn from punching him out for putting him in this situation.
123112222211.title: Unwelcome surprise at the production meeting

1231122222111.content:
Shawn was a little bit shocked about the recent development of this, but as he stated to the director and the crowed he had no real choice and now needs to keep his words and promises. This guides him together with his new roomie to the fundus and wardrobe of the studio, which was located in the same hotel where this kick off meeting just took place. The film company had rented the complete hotel, so there indeed will be no time for Shawn around here, because there are only film people here. Of course he could pretend to be one technicians or so, but this will be difficult or dangerous, so for the moment he was not thinking about this, but concentrating on his job. Also there will be hopefully be some extra payment for doing more than just two stunts, because saving the whole projects is not a small issue!

Anyhow now Shawn faced the moment of trying on some of the costumes, princess dresses mostly and his new roomie Kia will be more or less his personal assistance as well…
1231122222111.title: Venting and trying on costumes with Kia

12311222221111.content: If Shawn has to spend more time with Kia he wanted to know her better. His male mindset was much interested in her also, since she was a real attractive woman…Shawn was hating the situation he was in right now, not being a man while being around here and being around Kia…Anyhow it might become some fun….
12311222221111.title: small talk with Kia

choices: Resting in the hotel after the long day
On to the first day of shooting
12311222221112.content:
Kia led Shawn into a room of the hotel which was practically stuffed with racks and racks of costumes ranging from dresses to full on suits of armor. Shawn was about to reach out for a really nice looking piece of chain mail before Kia said, "You are going to look so beautiful in these." For a split second Shawn excitedly thought she was talking about the armor but when he turned he was disappointed to see that Kia was enraptured with a very lacy white dress. A bit crestfallen Shawn headed over to the dress section of the room where Kia stood beside a rack with three dresses. "Now we don't have your complete measurements on file, so if you could please strip down." Shawn looked a little confused and a little unbelieving Kia added, "We can't fit you for your dresses unless you strip down. No need to be embarrassed, it's just us girls."

"Yeah, us girls." Shawn said as he removed his sweatshirt and yoga pants he'd worn to the meeting. For the next 10 minutes Kia became about as intimate and familiar with Shelly's body than Shawn had ever been with he costuming measuring tape poking at every single part of Shawn making him blush on more than one occasion. Seeing this Kia said comfortingly, "You really have a beautiful body, I wish mine was as nice as yours." Shawn immediately and honestly replied, "Oh please, you're one of the most beautiful girl's I've ever met, any guy would be lucky to have you."

"It'd be nice if the guys I knew felt that way." As she started to probe her tape around Shawn's thighs Kia suddenly asked, "So how about you, you have a boyfriend," Shawn gave a bit of a guffaw at this. "I have had a boyfriend in my life."

"That can't be possible. Really? Never?"

Realizing how weird that must sound Shawn backtracked a little, "Well, I've never really been in a really real relationship. I've always been focused on my dream of being a stunt...woman since high school and everything else didn't seem important." It startled Shawn a bit how true this was. Neither in high school nor college did Shawn even have anything close to something you would call a serious girlfriend. He never really found it weird until now.

"Well that's good for you." Kia said sounding a little off put, "You're chasing your dream that's what's important. Now if you would please try on the brown dress."

Shawn took a brown dress made of a nice strong fabric and put it on in the bathroom even though Kia said he didn't have to. In his times in his life he'd made himself a woman, he had worn a handful of dresses, but never anything this complicated. There were layers of fabric misleading him on what was supposed to go where, he thought about calling Kia for help but didn't want to humiliate himself any further in front of her. Finally after what seemed a small lifetime, Shawn was in the dress. As much trouble it took him to get into the dress, Shawn was surprised by how easy it was to move in it. He was able to move and lift his legs freely which would make for easy kicks but the fabric didn't seem to fall too far. After testing his kicking theory out with a few minor exercises, Shawn emerged from the bathroom. "You look great! You are going to kick so much ass in that!"

"Wait, so this is what I'm fighting in? Doesn't it look too fancy?"

"Maybe if it was for a real fight, but this is for the movies silly," Kia giggled, "This was meant to be yours from the very beginning to do the stunts in, they got me your picture and I made the modifications to it based on that."

"You made this based on a picture alone? That's amazing!"

"Thank you," Kia said giving a mini curtsy, "Now that was the easy one, we've still got two more and these were meant for Maria so the measurements will be completely different for you. Plus they're much more complicated so I'm going to need to help you put them on."

With that Kia helped Shawn maneuver out of the brown dress and handed him a silky and delicate pink dress with even more layers of fabric. Knowing how much effort Kia had put into these Shawn felt a little guilty about how carelessly he'd thrown on the first dress and really let Kia lead the way with this one. In the back of his head Shawn thought about how nice it felt to have Kia delicately placing her hands all over him, but quickly pushed that thought out of his head, after all it's time to be a professional. Besides, he was Shelly for now, the last thing he wanted to do was make Kia uncomfortable with Shelly. This dress obviously didn't fit nearly as well as the first which had practically been form fitted. This one was a little short and was loose in the chest, Shawn knew that would be the case going in due to the modifications he made when originally constructing this body. "I'm going to have to get more fabric to layer in some extensions to the bottom, two inches worth should do it." As she went for a piece of paper to jot down some notes there was a knock on the door and Artie's voice came through saying, "Is everyone decent?" Not waiting for a reply he simply came in and found the two. Artie gave Shawn a full look over examining every aspect of Shelly's body in the dress. Shawn felt extremely uncomfortably about it especially the end of the inspection where Artie just unapologetically stared at Shawn's cleavage. Decided he'd had enough Shawn said, "I'm up here." Not moving and inch Artie simply said, "I know." Before turning to Kia and saying, "The bust needs to be bigger, more pronounced for the camera. The computer people will be able to make the adjustments to the face without a problem but the chest can't be fixed like that. Me her bigger." Artie said as he turned to leave the room and threw back, "Good work girls."

Shawn just stood mouth agape, "Did that just happen?"

Kia gave a sad and knowing smile, "Yes it did, and the worst part is he's right." With that Kia put two foam like pads into the top of the dress and stood back to get a better look. "It's not bad, but it needs something else. I think for this dress and the next one you'll need a corset."

"I'll need a what?"
12311222221112.title: Stuck trying on Dresses

123112222211121.content:
“A corset, but adjusting this and the dress takes me tomorrow morning. So we can start in the afternoon with the first try shots: Just dress in something casual; I will tell Artie the status that he can create the plan for tomorrow and the next days. Afterwards I would suggest we take the chance to use the spa of this very nice hotel, what do you think?” Kia said.
Shawn nodded even not being sure if this will be good or where it lead to… but on the outside he showed the most friendly face he had, so maybe he already started to become more an actress like a stuntman or woman….
Anyhow out of the dress and back into the sweatshirt and yoga shirt…
Some minutes later Kia told that they should go to their room and take their bathing things for the spa and pool, where they wanted to go now.
They went into their room and now Shawn inspected the wardrobe, which was packed and selected more or less by Rebecca, closer for the first time…
When he saw the swimsuit Rebecca had selected he could kill her for that, because this was a red two piece bikini and Shawn knows how hot his current body will look inside, but he also knows that he is still a guy inside trapped inside a hot woman!
Anyhow when he will call Rebecca later he will give her some words about this, but now he took the bikini and some towel and followed Kia to the spa area of the very nice hotel.
Kia was also wearing a bikini, a pink one, but it looked great on her olive skin tone and she had a real nice figure and ass. Shawn could not avoid to give her a comment: ”Wow you look great, why are you hiding the whole day inside plain clothes?”
“Thanks, Shelly, but you remember the situation with Artie before? He was fixed to your assets and not to your person or job….”
“You are right, but that seems to be a good looking girls fate!” stated Shawn starting to realize that he is one of them at the moment….

1231122222111211.content: Shawn was a little bit nervous like a school boy or girl, entering the spa now as a hot girl and with a hot girl, Kia….
1231122222111211.title: in the spa

“A corset, but we will see this tomorrow!” Kia said and after a while they both fall asleep in their shared room.

For the first few photos Shawn just did standard poses of looking far off into the distance and looking into the camera with different level's of 'intensity' as Dean put it. Shawn didn't see the point of this as his face would be Photoshopped out but just went along with it. But Shawn did his best and even had a little bit of fun with it. After a few minutes of taking pictures without incident Dean announced that he was ready for the next set. Dean yelled at some random techie who immediately ran off and rolled in a giant circular fan to the side of the green screen. "Ok Shelly, breaks over. Let's get back to work." Shawn groaned and turned back to the green screen.

The next set was not as much fun as the last. Dean had the fan turned up for wind effects. As he took the pictures he kept saying it looked great but Shawn didn't feel great at all. His blonde hair was blowing in his face practically non stop causing him to choke on hair every now and then. And then there was the dress. The dress was nice, pretty, and flowing, and while Dean said that it looked 'great', Shawn just suspected that he was enjoying the view of Shawn's legs and thighs which kept getting flashed towards Dean while he took his pictures. Getting really annoyed Shawn walked straight over to Kia who was waiting with a brush and a kind word. "You're doing great, you look amazing, you're almost done."

When Shawn first learned about his job he thought he was going to have a crummy time. He didn't particularly like working as a woman, but hey, a paycheck was a paycheck. Then when he basically got blackmailed into working everyday as a woman he thought he was going to go nuts at the situation he'd been put in. But he found solace in his roommate Kia who made the whole experience not only tolerable, but kind of fun.

For the first week of work Shawn would have to wake up early, spend up to two hours in a trailer getting his hair and clothing set to perfection. Then he'd spend a few hours on some mountaintop or in some castle window for far away shots taken by from a helicopter, and then he'd spend a few more hours standing in the background of group shots just trying to ignore the occasional stagehand looking at his corset enhanced breasts. This should have been just a horrible and dragging experience, but Kia was always on the set with him to make a joke with him in between takes and she'd always be there back at their room for a movie, some wine, and good company. It was probably one of the most fun weeks Shawn had had in years. The only downside was he wasn't himself.

More than anything Shawn wanted to hang out with Kia as himself, let her know the real Shawn as opposed to Shelly. But there was never a chance. The one time he got a chance to go out on his own he had to use that time to go shopping just to get clothes for when he was Shawn in the future, but that opportunity had not arisen. At least not yet.

At the end of another long day of standing around looking pretty, Shawn opened up the door to his and Kia's room only for some fabric to fly in his face. "Get dressed up girlfriend! We've been cooped up here too long, we're going out to the bar and let some guys buy us drinks til we puke."

It was a fairly short skirt and a revealing top that Shawn recognized as one of the outfits that Rebecca had gotten him when he was too tired to protest. "Do we have too? Can't we just do the usual and watch a movie and eat ice cream?"

"Yes we do have to. I saw you out there today, you looked like you were about to die of boredom. Ice cream and movies works for a lot of things but not that. You need to find some fun and excitement on the dance floor."

"I just don't know if I feel up to that Kia." Shawn saw how disappointed Kia looked, "But don't let me hold you back, you can go out and have a good time. Besides I think I'm just going to hold you back."

"Listen Shelly, I'm going to that club a few blocks down, I expect you to be dressed up and down there in 20 minutes." And with that Kia left Shawn to himself in the room to think about what he was going to do. Shawn smiled, because he was definitely going to go party with Kia, his only question was whether he was going to go as Shawn or Shelly. He wanted to go as Shawn, but there in could lie some problems with finding a way to transform back. Plus Shawn could screw up, get shot down, and end up watching Kia leave with some other guy. But if he was Shelly he could keep a close eye on her without getting a weird look and save Kia meeting Shawn for another day.

"Lights! Camera! Action!" the director Artie Fowler said into his megaphone.

Taking his cue, Shawn the stuntman jumped off of a castle tower window and jumped. Down down he fell to the safety pad in his stuntwoman's dress. As he fell Shawn thought back to the last week. Maria Solana, the actress Shawn had been standing in for, finally showed up letting Shawn get back to doing what he was hired to do, perform stunts. So over the last week Shawn had filmed all of the fight and fire related scenes very well and now was performing his last stunt of the shoot. Shawn didn't know when he was getting his plane ticket and going home, but Shawn knew it would be soon. And every day Shawn delayed telling Kia the truth about himself. Shawn knew he wanted to tell her, but it had to be perfect where he could be at his most charming and the time just never seemed right. I'm going to do it tonight. I'm going to bounce off of this landing pad, go straight to the hotel, and confess everything, Shawn thought to himself as he plummeted.

And he might have done just that if the production crew hadn't moved the pad a few feet to the left without telling Shawn. So as he hit the mat instead of bouncing on it, he practically glanced it and rolled off of it.

"FUCK!" Shawn shouted out as he hit the ground. Everyone on the staff rushed up to him, cameras and microphones included, to see how bad he'd been hurt. Shawn looked down and lifted up his dress and everyone gasped upon seeing his left leg broken below the knee. Shawn saw this, and felt the intense pain of it, but quickly shifted some nerves around so the pain was practically non-existent. Then putting on his best acting face cringed and said, "It's not that bad, it may look broken but it feels good, it's probably just the light." Shawn just needed to prevent people from getting a close look at it so he could shift everything back into place.

"No way, that's defiantly broken," one of the cameramen said. "See, I got it right here," he said as he showed a grotesque still shot of Shawn's definitely broken leg.

Well isn't that great, Shawn thought to himself knowing there was no way he could fix his leg until at least the shoot was over and maybe not even until he was back in LA.

"Get her to the hospital." Artie said then showing how much he cared added, "We're done with her anyway, that was her last shot."

"Fantastic." Shawn said as he was helped into an ambulance where he'd be taken to the hospital.
