In the past it took little more than a passing thought and a few seconds to heal a broken bone. "Could something else have changed", he thinks to himself. There is also Kia. He wishes he could have told her the truth. His whole life he's avoided getting close to anyone because of his ability, but with Kia he wanted to try. Shawn eventually goes to sleep.
12311222221112221212212212121.title: On plane ride home

123112222211122212122122121212.content: Shawn is only asleep for an hour when he wakes up feeling sick. He rushes to the bathroom bearly making it to the toilet before he throws up. After getting it all out he stands up and looks in the mirror. The girl he bacame for this job is still staring back at him. "What the hell is going on", he says out loud. He's never been sick before a day in his life. Something about his ability kept him from getting sick. The drugs he got from the hospital should have worn of by now. For a second he's tempting to attempt to change back. The only thing that gives him pause is if he did change back he would be discovered. He is after all on a airplane and a hot chick like he is now was no doubt noticed by a few. If she was suddenly replaced by a guy it would be noticed. He decides to attempt instead to heal his leg the rest of the way. He looks down at his leg and concentrates on healing it the rest of the way. Nothing happenes. He then tries harder putting everything he has into it. Slowely the swelling starts to go down and the bruise fades. Several minutes later it's healed, but it was way harder than it should have been. The strain has taken it's toll. Shawn is exhausted and covered in sweat. It feels as if he's just ran a marathon. He knows right away that if it took that much effort to heal something simple as some sweeling and a bruise there is no way he can change back.
123112222211122212122122121212.title: Wake's an hour later feeling sick

1231122222111222121221221212121.content: Shawn sleeps a good part of the rest of the flight. Another connecting flight later and he's back home. Rebecca meets him at the airport. Shawn struggles with his luggage getting it to the car. "Why don't you just grow some muscle and hurry up", Rebecca teases? Shawn frowns and says, "I can't". Rebecca notices that her cousin is in distress and helps him get the luggage into the trunk. As soon as they get into the car she turns to him and asks, "What's going on"? Shawn explains what happened. "Oh shit, this is bad. I had another gig lined up for you", she says. "I think we have bigger problems than just a job right now", Shawn exclaims. Rebecca nods her head and tells him he's right. "Would you be willing to see my doctor friend", she asks. She's asked this before and he's always said no. He never wanted to be a lab experiement for Rebecca's doctor friend, but things have changed now.
1231122222111222121221221212121.title: Arriving home

choices: you don't have any viruses or infections
12311222221112221212212212121211.content:
Shawn agrees seeing no other options. Rebecca makes a quick call to see if he's in and is soon heading to his office. "Can I use your phone", Shawn asks? "Sure, who are calling", she asks while handing it over? "Kia, a girl I met on set. I promised her I would call and let her know I got back ok", Shawn answers. Shawn calls and gets Kia's voice mail. He leaves a quick message and hands Rebecca back her phone. While at a red light Rebecca looks over at Shawn giving him a big smile. "What", he blurts out. She laughs and says, "I can't beleive it. You're in love". Shawn blushes and says, "No, she's just really special. It doesn't matter anyway. She only knows me as Shelly". Rebecca smiles and says, "You never know Shawn, people can suprise you sometimes". Shawn sits back feeling depressed. Kia could have been the one. His ability sure found a hell of a time to quit working.

Rebecca pulls into the parking lot of her doctor friends office. He's more a research scientist than a doctor so he doesn't have a waiting room full of people. he comes out a short time later a man in a white lab coat comes out. "Mark, it's so good to see you", Rebecca says giving him a hug. She's talked about him before. They dated back in college. It didn't work out as he was buried in his work and younger. He went to college at 15 and graduated with a PHD at 19. Dispite it all he and Rebecca remained friends. "Is this your cousin that you told me about", he asked looking at you? You shake his hand and intraduce yourself as Shelly as that seems to work best for now. "Rebecca didn't say exactly what the problem was and I'll have to let you know I'm not a physician. I'm a molecular biologist and geneticist I don't know exactly what I can help you with", he says. "Mark, just run every test you have and tell us if you see anything odd", Rebecca states. Mark laughs and says, "Ok, but only because you're asking".

An hour later after getting poked just about everywhere and having everything sampled Mark announces he got everything he needs. "How soon before we have something", Shawn asks? Mark smiles and says, "With the toys my boss lets me play with at this lab I have something within a few minutes. I want have a complete breakdown though for a few hours". Mark was loading samples into equipment while he was taking them and one of them is now beeping. "Well, we have something already", Mark announces. He walks over and taps on his keyboard. He then turns and says congratulations you're............
12311222221112221212212212121211.title: He agrees

123112222211122212122122121212111.content: He then turns and says, "Congratulations you're pregnant". "What! How the hell did that happen", Shelly shouts? Mark laughs and say, "There is only one way I know of". "No, no, you don't understand. I'm a guy. There is no way I can be pregnant. I haven't even had sex", Shelly blurts out. Mark frowns, looks shelly up and down, turns to Rebecca and says, "I did tell you I'm not a physician. I left out that I'm also not a phsycologist". Rebecca just looks at him and says, "She's telling you the truth. She's really my cousin Shawn. You met him a couple of times back in college, maybe more times than you know. Shawn is or rather was a shapeshifter". Mark sits there with a (you're fucking with me look on his face). Just then another test completes and his computer starts beeping. He turns and starts typing. He then turns back around and says, "I was about to say you hand to be screwing with me, but her DNA is unlike anything I've ever seen". He then can't take his eyes off of Shelly. "Mark, he can't change anymore. Something has happened and we need your help", Rebecca says snapping him back to reality. "Well, I'm only speculating, but even though her DNA is well alien she still functions like any other life form. She's reproducing so her body is focused on growing and protecting that life. Her body won't let her harm that life by changing into a man. As for not having sex it could be that she's capably of Asexual reproduction. Something happened to trigger this. It could be that once the pregnancy is over her ability will return. I just don't know". Shawn can't take anymore and runs out. Rebecca starts to follow. "I'll have more I hope later", Mark says before she leaves.
123112222211122212122122121212111.title: pregnant

1231122222111222121221221212121111.content:
Rebecca's attempts to cheer Shawn up fell flat. Her unhappiness was clear. "Maybe something happened to you while you were drunk?" posed Rebecca. Shawn didn't reply. "Shawn, we will figure this out, I promise!" she declared. Shawn remained silent, all she could think about was that her life was over. All her hopes and dreams had come crashing down. TO make matters worse, she had no idea how it could have happened.

Finally they arrive at Shawn's apartment and see a familiar person there. "Kia?" exclaimed a surprised Shawn. "Shelly!" cried Kia, running up to hug Shawn. Shawn wrapped her arms around the beautiful girl, so relieved that something good was happening at least. "Ahem, Shelly, my dear cousin, perhaps you can introduce me to your beautiful new girlfriend!" suggested a teasing Rebecca, relieved at the change in Shawn's demeanour. "Oh year, this is Kia! Kia, this is my cousin Becky!" explained Shawn. "Delighted to meet you!" declared Kia. "Likewise!"

"Um....Shelly? I need to speak with you, privately. It's something you are going to find hard to understand. I...it's very important!" she tried to clarify. "Understood! Take care cousin!" declared a winking Becky. Shawn watched his cousin leave as she invited Kia up. "How did you know how to find me?" asked Shawn. "I got some people to help! I couldn't stop thinking about you since New Zealand. That's not creepy, stalkery, isn't it?" Kia checked, worried. "I've thought about you too!" she responded. Kia blushed before saying. "There's something I have to tell you!" she repeated as she paced up and down the main hall of his room.

"Kia, you can tell me anything!" declared Shawn. Kia nodded, blushing again before she changed into Alyssa Milano. Shawn's eyed widened. Kia turned back, looking terrified. "That's my secret, I...I can change shape. My name really is Kia and I actually look like this, but...I didn't want to shock you. And....I kinda of....maybe....got you pregnant!" she added. "What do you mean you were the one who got me pregnant?" asked a shocked Shawn.

"Okay, take it easy! I...I kind of figured out that you were a fellow shapeshifter! I mean I could read all the signs. But I liked you as in I want to be in a relationship with you, like you! And...well I touched your hands during my attraction, which I never do! And....well I could....feel your pregnancy! And I knew that it was me because my Dad said that's how she got my Mum pregnant with me!" she confirmed. "But....But I can't shape shift now because I'm pregnant!" Shawn squealed. "Yeah, I know. But it's ok, because I know you must feel the same or else, you would be madder or something! Can you forgive me? And maybe be my girlfriend?" she proposed, hopefully.

Shawn....
1231122222111222121221221212121111.title: Head back home

12311222221112221212212212121211111.content:
Shawn took a moment to attempt to get himself under control. Kia was a shape-shifter. She got him pregnant. She wanted him to be her girlfriend. However that was moment passed resulting in Shawn acting like any man in this odd situation. "HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE?" Shawn cried. "Shelly, sweetheart, take a deep breath. It's going to be ok!" "HOW CAN..." Kia cut her off with a kiss. "Sweetheart..." she began; "I understand that you don’t come from a shape-shifting background. But pregnancy between shape-shifters is enormously common and I have a GP who specialises in births of our people!”

“But I still can’t understand how can this be happening to me????” he exclaimed, still nervous. “What isn’t clear, darling?” she asked, squeezing her hand. Shawn found herself enjoying the hand squeeze. Heck, if Shawn wasn’t pregnant, she would be thrilled to bits. “How can you get me pregnant if you’re a girl just by squeezing my hand?” “Well, as shape-shifters, our DNA is a little fragile, so it doesn’t take much for our bodies to manufacture reproductive capacity, especially when DNA is involved. When you morphed your hand to punch that guy, I took your hand right afterwards. You had been sweating from dancing and my sweat from my hand mixed with yours. When it dried, the moisture entered your pores and the rest as they say is history!” she explained.

“So that creep is the reason I’m pregnant? What a terrible story to tell our child!” gasped Shawn. Kia giggled nervously. “Um…it may be more than one!” she observed. “What do you mean ‘may’?” asked Shawn. “Well….I’m a triplet! So is my Dad and so are her 3 younger siblings. And my paternal grandparents are quintuplets. So it’s a possibility!” Kia explained. Shawn took a moment to process this before passing out.
12311222221112221212212212121211111.title: freaked out

choices: Shelly is barely able to return Rebecca before full transformation
123112222211122212122122121212111113.content:
Shawn 'Shelly' Rowe woke up in her bed. Kia and Rebecca were sitting in chairs next to her. Kia Libbi had her arms folded around her, looking far less pleased than she had earlier. "Hello Shawn! Welcome back!" she declared, her voice far less happy. Shawn tried to think of something, anything to reply before Kia moved to the bed. "Honey, I don't care! But I am going to honest with you, I don't want a relationship with Shawn, I want one with Shelly! My Shelly who I fell in love with!" she replied.

Shawn wasn't sure what to reply. Kia took her hand. She took a deep breath before she began talking. "Honey, you aren't Shawn Rowe. Or at least, you won't be anymore. Now that you are pregnant, your base form will be that of Shelly Rowe. That's not me trying to tell you to be her, that's a result of the pregnancy!" "I...I don't understand." whimpered Shelly. "Shelly, the pregnancy will alter you. You won't have the same abilities, they will be different to accommodate both the pregnancy and the breast feeding!" she explained.

"How?" gasped Shelly. "Well, the babies will be born faster than a traditional human birth. They will need to be breastfed for approximately 24 months. You can expect a third breast to develop for multiple births, more if there will be more than three children. You will always have milk, so you will need to eat more to maintain your body weight. You won't be able to transform into a man until you stop breastfeeding. Even after that, your default form will be that of Shelly Rowe. You will no longer be able to change into a non-human being. But you will develop transformative and duplicative abilities!" she revealed.

"Could you explain that a little further? I...I'm freaking a little. Transformative and Duplicative?" squealed Shelly. Kia nodded, squeezing Shelly's hand again in a comforting manner. "You can make copies of yourself to do jobs. They will be under the belief that they are the original Shawn. They can't exist without you. And you can delete them at any time. If they die, you will feel pain. As for transformative, you can turn any sentient being without shapeshifter abilites into anything. But you will be limited in the amount of times you can do these things." she discussed with Shelly.

"Could you give an example please, babe? I....I still don't get transformative." replied Shelly. Kia beamed at being called babe, making Shelly smile in return. "Well if you wanted to, you could say turn Rebecca into a dog and she would stay that way until you undid it!" she responded. "Wait, what?" demanded Rebecca, less than happy about this. "The problem is, that if you did, Rebecca would be a dog for a while. It would take a lot of energy to return her to human form!" continued Kia.

Shelly grinned malevolently at Rebecca, remembering that horrible assignment that Rebecca had got her. It almost severed their relationship as Becky had been less than ethical during the time, using it to get a little payback for Shawn's less than professional manner at that time. Fortunately they got their relationship back on track. "So I could theoretically picture Rebecca turning into a poodle and..." But Shelly never got to finish that sentence as Rebecca began changing in front of their eyes. "Shawn, stop it!" screamed Rebecca.
123112222211122212122122121212111113.title: Waking up

1231122222111222121221221212121111131.content:
Shelly thought being a pregnant woman was scary. Watching her cousin Becky transform into a poodle more than topped it. She tried desperately to stop it, looking at an equally shocked Kia for advice. But it didn't change the little white poodle from barking at them when it was over. Kia put her hand over Shelly's mouth to keep her from screaming. "Babe, calm down! We need to get Rebecca to Doctor Borg, our OBGYN and GP, right away!" she explained. Shelly nodded as Kia slowly removed her hand. "H-How did...did I do that?" she whimpered. "I don't know, Shelly! You weren't supposed to be able to do that until you had the babies! We need to head to Doctor Borg's practice immediately!" she declared.

Becky kept barking, looking around aimlessly as if so freaked she could do nothing else. "Becky, I'm sorry! Please....please calm down!" whimpered Shelly. “Becky, its Kia! Stop barking if you can understand us!” requested Kia. Becky kept barking, worrying the two shapeshifters before stopping. “What…what do we do, Kia? I’m…I’m trying to focus on turning her back…but it’s not working!” stammered Shelly. "Becky, if you bark twice, we will know that you are still there mentally. Anything else and we have to assume that you are a poodle in full. That means the vet!" commanded Kia.

Two quick barks came from Becky who leapt into Kia's arms. "Okay, that settles it! She is still Rebecca Perry inside! But we need to take her to Dr Borg. Dr Borg might know how to return her to womanhood!" remarked Kia. Before Shelly could answer, she heard a familiar ringtone. She reached for Becky's phone and was relieved to answer it in her cousin's voice. "Yes, this is Rebecca Perry. How can I assist you? You need a poodle for a dog food commercial. Is a female poodle ok? Just a minute, please!" Shelly stopped to turn to Kia, keeping her hand on the phone. "Then need a poodle!" she revealed.
1231122222111222121221221212121111131.title: Rebecca the poddle

12311222221112221212212212121211111311.content:
Kia whispered "Sorry Becky, we need Shelly to be you until we figure out how to turn you back!" Kia took the phone and changed into Becky. "We have the perfect poodle for you. We just need confirmation as to the conditions you have for one of our top poodles, Becky. Yes, my girlfriend Shelly convinced the owner to name her after me! She is highly intelligent and well trained. She is a sensitive, little dog around 2 years old. No kennels, no breeding and she needs to be returned to her owner after each shoot. Excellent, I will send you the pics, could I get an email address and phone number? Perfect, we will call you back with the arrangements!" declared Kia.

She put down the phone, looking at the poodle. "Becky, you need to do this job, while we are working on turning you back! Shelly and I will take care of things for now, but we need to continue to make money. Shelly, I will see what I can do about keeping your talent business going. We may need to expand it to include my work as a fashion designer. But before we do anything else, I have to call Dr Borg and get an appointment for you and Becky!" she revealed. Shelly/Shawn agreed, holding a less than happy poodle. "We will figure this out, Becky! I am so sorry about this!" she declared. Becky just whined a little. Kia came back, looking unhappy. "Dr Borg said we can meet him in....."
12311222221112221212212212121211111311.title: Rebecca the dogfood star

123112222211122212122122121212111113113.content:
Kia came back, looking unhappy. "Dr Borg said we can meet him in a month. He is sending over a nurse who specialises in shape-shifting care and midwifery. He suggests talking to the nurse about Becky. He apologises for this!" she exclaimed, bitterly. "Becky has to stay a poodle for a month? And I don't get to see the doctor about being a pregnant man? What the hell is wrong with this doctor?" cried Shawn/Shelly angrily. "He is a jerk for doing this! But he is the only doctor who I know that understands shape-shifters!" she replied, annoyed.

"We should talk to Mark, he is a doctor!" suggested Shelly. "Is Mark aware of shape-shifters? Has he actually provided medical care to them?" Kia sought confirmation. "Well he knows about them, because we told him when I fell pregnant." explained Shelly. Kia paused before reaching for the phone again. "What are you doing?" asked Shelly/Shawn. "Where does Mark live?" she responded, looking nervous. "W-Why?" stammered the pregnant shape-shifter. "Because he is in danger!" she revealed. "Why would he be in danger?" squealed Shelly. "Where does he live, darling?" she repeated. “I think…43rd Second Street!” nervously answered Shelly/Shawn. “Hello Directory? This is Kia890b678! I need information about a… What is his last name?” Kia whispered.

“Dr Mark Sheppard!” she replied. “I need information about a Dr Mark Sheppard of 43rd Second Street, it’s a…. Yes, I see. Thank you!” she replied. Kia was pale when she turned to Shelly and the poodle Becky. “Becky, Shelly….we won’t be seeing Mark for a while. He…he just got picked up by people who don’t want our kind exposed. I’m sorry!” stammered Kia. Becky began whining, running up and down the bed, terrified. Shelly looked shocked. Kia squeezed her hand. “Thanks for the phone message.” She chirped, tried to lighten the situation. “When is the nurse coming?” Shelly asked.
123112222211122212122122121212111113113.title: a month

choices: responded she would discuss it with the Doctor
1231122222111222121221221212121111131131.content:
"Dr Borg said she would..." The apartment buzzer went off. Kia rose, shifted into Becky and approached the door. "This is Rebecca Perry! Who is at my door, please?" she asked, formally. "Ms Liddi, this is Nurse Dreux! I work for Dr Borg. Might I come in?" requested the person knocking. Kia opened the door, where a tall blonde nurse entered (http://pretty-little-liars.wikia.com/wik...).

"Hi, Ms Liddi. So where is the patient?" she enquired. Kia indicated Shelly, before taking Shelly's hand. "This is my girlfriend Shelly Rowe. She was originally born a man and she accidentally turned her female cousin into this poodle!" she revealed. The nurse took Becca and lifted her to her face. "Hmmm....looks like she used a mental inversion. It is not uncommon for pregnant shape-shifters to do this if they are having 7 or more children." she answered. Shelly went deathly pale, causing Kia to hold her tight.

"S-Seven!" she stammered. Nurse Dreux beamed at Shelly. "I wouldn't worry about it dear! Now I will need to examine your tummy! Don't fret, I'll be careful not to tickle!" she expressed, gently. Shelly felt a little hot under her collar. She didn't like being spoken to as if she was a child. Nevertheless she lifted her shirt, exposing her belly. The nurse approached her, resting her head against Shelly's stomach. "I hear 9 separate heartbeats. You should drink this, dear. The babies will be born in around 14 weeks, give or take."

"14 weeks! But I only found out I was pregnant today after getting pregnant a few days ago!" whined Shawn/Shelly. "Yes, dear. But it will happen quickly. I've been delivering shapeshifting babies for around 12 decades, so I am pretty experienced!" she giggled. "Wait...did you say 12 decades? Do you mean years?" stammered Shawn/Shelly. "No, sweetie, it has been 120 years! I was originally a lute player!" she mused, smiling. Shawn/Shelly looked at Kia, who kissed her cheek. She didn't seem the least bit surprised. "Now as for your cousin, we will need to provide her with diothemisone! That will keep her safe from hormonal or mental shifts." she advised.

"Can you turn her back?" whimpered Shawn/Shelly. Nurse Dreux
1231122222111222121221221212121111131131.title: in an hour

1231122222111222121221221212121111131131.content:
Nurse Dreux shook her head sadly. "I am afraid that it beyond my skills! The best thing you can do is wait until your children are born, sweetie! Doctor Borg could probably do something though! But as explained earlier, he is very busy. Have you two considered moving to Cosquillas Bay? The famous city for ladies would be ideal, not to mention there would certainly be people who could help you! I believe the young Candace Barker (http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid...) has the ability to fix her and she lives in Cosquillas Bay!" she revealed.

"Is she a shapeshifter?" asked Shawn. "She is a lot of things, I believe she can shapeshift if she chooses. She doesn't like men at all though. Except for her twin brother Chris of course. But he is genetically female, so I don't think it counts. I believe Chris can shapeshift others though. He used to be a bit of a womaniser, so best to avoid him. He also deeply resents members of his gender." she suggested. "Thank you for your suggestion, Nurse Dreux. I don't think we will visit the Barker twins though!" Kia declares, nudging you to follow her.

Nurse Dreux nods, beaming. She is taking out a series of medications as you follow Kia. "Why shouldn't we get help from Candace Barker?" asked Shawn as she closed the door of their bedroom. "That is a very mean family! Especially their mother, Ashley! Candace is a known murderor! Look what her grandfather did to his best friend Asteroth after he fought with Candace! I don't want either of us involved with those psychos! Let Becca spend some time as a dog instead! I am terrified of that family! And what they might do to you if they find out that you're not a woman by birth!" she exclaimed.
1231122222111222121221221212121111131131.title: shook her head sadly

"Dr Borg said she would..." The apartment buzzer went off. Kia rose, shifted into Becky and approached the door. "This is Rebecca Perry! Who is at my door, please?" she asked, formally. "Ms Liddi, this is Nurse Dreux! I work for Dr Borg. Might I come in?" requested the person knocking. Kia opened the door, where a tall blonde nurse entered (http://pretty-little-liars.wikia.com/wik...).

"Hi, Ms Liddi. So where is the patient?" she enquired. Kia indicated Shelly, before taking Shelly's hand. "This is my girlfriend Shelly Rowe. She was originally born a man and she accidentally turned her female cousin into this poodle!" she revealed. The nurse took Becca and lifted her to her face. "Hmmm....looks like she used a mental inversion. It is not uncommon for pregnant shape-shifters to do this if they are having 7 or more children." she answered. Shelly went deathly pale, causing Kia to hold her tight.

"S-Seven!" she stammered. Nurse Dreux beamed at Shelly. "I wouldn't worry about it dear! Now I will need to examine your tummy! Don't fret, I'll be careful not to tickle!" she expressed, gently. Shelly felt a little hot under her collar. She didn't like being spoken to as if she was a child. Nevertheless she lifted her shirt, exposing her belly. The nurse approached her, resting her head against Shelly's stomach. "I hear 9 separate heartbeats. You should drink this, dear. The babies will be born in around 14 weeks, give or take."

"14 weeks! But I only found out I was pregnant today after getting pregnant a few days ago!" whined Shawn/Shelly. "Yes, dear. But it will happen quickly. I've been delivering shapeshifting babies for around 12 decades, so I am pretty experienced!" she giggled. "Wait...did you say 12 decades? Do you mean years?" stammered Shawn/Shelly. "No, sweetie, it has been 120 years! I was originally a lute player!" she mused, smiling. Shawn/Shelly looked at Kia, who kissed her cheek. She didn't seem the least bit surprised. "Now as for your cousin, we will need to provide her with diothemisone! That will keep her safe from hormonal or mental shifts." she advised.

Doctor Borg could probably do something though! But as explained earlier, he is very busy. Have you two considered moving to Cosquillas Bay? "There you go clumsy." Kia said as she wheeled Shawn back into their room. The trip to the hospital had not been fun at all. Shawn had to just sit back and wait for xray results that he knew the results to down to the exact minor cracks, he should know, he shifted them there. On the way to the hospital Shawn made it so that his leg was broken but not nearly to the extent that it initially was. With alot of very careful and precise shifting around he'd made it so the break wasn't as bad as it looked and would heal up completely in just a few weeks, although as soon as Shawn got back to America that healing time would be a matter of seconds. But he knew that while he kept up the appearance of Shelly he'd have to keep a broken leg wrapped up in a pink cast that Kia so kindly picked out for him while he was doped up on pain medications. As a matter of fact Shawn was still a little loopy on pain meds. So much so that he wasn't exactly being careful with his words.

"You know I could have just gotten up and walked out of there without the wheelchair." Shawn said looking up to Kia not bothering to wipe the hair off of his covered face.

"I'm sure you could have. You can be one tough bitch." Kia said amused at her loopy friend.

"You can come with me if you want," the drugged up stuntman said as he examined and shifted around the lines in his hands.

"Don't offer that, I just might take you up on it. I have been thinking of making a move to LA and I'm done with this production tomorrow morning so I actually could." As Kia helped her roommate into bed she added, "As soon as you come down from those pain pills we can talk about it if you're up to it."

"No no no I want you to come and hang out with me and stay at my place and...stuff." Shawn said picturing walks on the beach, trips to the zoo, and making pizza. Man I want pizza Shawn's drug addled brain thought.

Kia laughed some more, "Well, we'll talk about it tomorrow. But I gotta say it would be nice if we were roommates a bit longer. I know we've only known each other a few weeks but you are already one of the best friends I've ever had. I really trust you."

At this point Shawn should be thinking about telling Kia either the truth or trying to break off this arrangement before someone got hurt. That would be the right thing to do. But right now Shawn was not thinking straight and just blurted out...

"Hey Kia. Watch this." Shawn blurted out to get Kia's attention. Kia turned bemused by her very wacked out friend and was stunned to see a copy of herself where Shelly had been sitting before. Kia just stared at Shawn for a minute wondering what she was watching. After taking everything in, Kia with a very shaken voice said, "Shelly? What's going on?"

Shawn sat back and with Kia's voice replied, "Well, I'm a shapeshifter and I just turned into you. I thought you'd like it," and then after an awkward silence the Shawn form of Kia slapped her head and said, "Oh yeah, I forgot. I haven't told you yet. Well Kia, I'm a shapeshifter. Neato huh?" Shawn looks at Kia with dopey eyes as if waiting for Kia to say she was impressed.

Kia wasn't as freaked out. She had suspected that Shelly had a secrets about her but she had never suspected this. Then thinking about that for a second Kia asked a follow up question. "So Shelly, I have to ask, are you really...you?"

Shawn just looked confused before realizing what Kia had meant. "I'm really me but I'm not Shelly. I'm me. Shawn." And with that finally said Shawn shifts from Kia into his normal form. A few seconds later Shawn was himself and said to Kia, "I wanted to tell you earlier but I thought you'd get mad and I really really like you and I don't want you mad at me. I didn't want to make you uncomfortable or sad or angry. I love you." Shawn said in a rambling fashion to Kia his words now starting to slur from the medications in his system. "Nite nite." Shawn said as he shifted back into Shelly and curled up on his bed.

Kia was floored. She rushed over to Shawn on the bed and shook him while practically shouting, "But why now? What are you saying? Please tell me why you're doing this!" But Shawn could not respond, he was passed out with little hope of him waking for hours. Kia stepped back realizing that waking him was futile, even if she did manage to wake him he would be in no state to answer questions. "Figures, a guy finally tells me he loves me and he turns out to be my best girl friend roommate who's really a shapeshifting guy." Kia sat on her own bed just looking at 'Shelly'. Kia was filled with so many feelings ranging from the betrayal of her best friend to embarrassment at having gotten dressed frequently in front of a guy, to curiosity at having such a fascinating friend, and even a little bit of flattery at having someone confess their love for her. "I need to think about this." Kia told herself as she crawled into bed.
_________________________________________________________


The next morning Shawn woke up to the worst headache of his life. He would try to shift things around in his mind to make the pain go away, but that was the one thing he never wanted to attempt to mess with, the brain was to delicate a thing to tamper with. Shawn got up to walk to the bathroom, but stopped after taking a step with his still broken leg. "Damn it." Shawn said to himself knowing he couldn't fix this so long as Kia was still around.

Kia.

Shawn tried his best to think back as to what happened last night worried that he may have said something to her that could get him in trouble. Nervously he turned tot he shower where Kia was just emerging, but instead of being wrapped in a towel like she normally would be, she was very fully dressed. Shawn noticed this but had other things on his mind to ask her about, "Hey Kia, my memory from last night is a little bit fuzzy, did something happen that I need to know about?"

Kia looked surprised at the person she now knew was Shawn and thought about her responce. She could just pretent nothing happened. Just let Shawn walk away and head out on the airplane back to LA without confronting him. She'd go back to her normal life and he'd probably go back to whatever was normal for him.

Or she could confront him. Learn everything she can about who he is and why he's done what he's done. And she could even ask him what he meant by 'I love you.'

Looking at Shawn Kia made a split second decision and decided to...

After a few wonderful and glorious second Kia separated and added, "And that's for being a good friend the last few weeks."

"But, why?" Was all that Shawn could get out.

"I admit when I first found out last night I was really mad, but I spent just about all night thinking about it and how hard it must have been for you. And I thought back at everything we did together and I figured that if it had been a guy I was doing it with the least he should get would be a kiss."

"The least?" Shawn said noticing the word.

"We can't exactly do more now. Shelly has to go. Her ticket to America leaves in a few hours and she really has to go soon. I'll take her to the airport and drop her off there."

"But then will she, I mean, will I ever see you again?" Shawn asked.

12311222221112221212212221112.content:
Ever since Shawn had gotten back from New Zealand, he had put the majority of his time and money into his apartment investing his money in paying a years worth of rent in advance, some new appliances including a washer and dryer, and lots of cleaning supplies. Rebecca had been telling him that she was proud of him for really putting himself together and acting like an adult. The part she didn't know about was that he was acting like an adult who wanted to impress his girlfriend who was coming over for the first time. After putting on and smoothing out his newly purchased fine Egyptian cotton bedsheets that he kind of hoped would have a beautiful girl in them sooner rather than later Shawn stood back and observed the fruits of his labor.

Shawn was satisfied with how clean the place was after spending the week with either a vacuum or mop in hand (and in one case when Shawn was really bored a feather duster while wearing an old maid costume from Halloween a year ago) and moved over to the dining area. Here Shawn brought out all the stops with a bunch of roses, candles, and a bottle of wine on the dinner table with a pot roast slow roasting in his new oven that would be ready by the time Kia got there in 32 minutes. Kia had told Shawn that she'd be there promptly at 6 PM. Shawn really wanted to return the favor she did with him in New Zealand but refused the offer insisting that he let her find him and his apartment herself.

Seeing everything seemed to be in order Shawn decided to do some touch ups to himself in his newly retiled bathroom. As Shawn flossed and brushed his teeth nervously for the 5 time that day Shawn thought back to what he'd done this week and all the money he'd gone through. Somehow in just a week he'd already blown through almost all of his money from the New Zealand job. Granted it was spent on some very reasonable and responsible things, but he knew that pretty soon he'd have to look for another stunt job soon, but for now he pushed that thought out of his mind as it went back to Kia. The girl who had stolen his heart was the only thing on his mind. Sometimes at night when he wasn't thinking about it he found himself starting to shift into her. But as tempted as he was to...enjoy himself in her body Shawn chose (reluctantly) to play the gentleman and respect her body.

After finishing his clean up Shawn was startled by the sound of a knocking on his front door. Anxiously Shawn looked at the clock on the shelf sitting beside Shelly's cast and a picture of Kia that he'd kept as keepsakes. "She's 8 minutes early!" Shawn said excitedly as he double checked himself in the mirror to make sure he was himself and rushed to the door.

12311222221112221212212221112112.content:
6 months had passed since that fateful day when Kia moved in with Shawn. And for the most part it had been 6 months of bliss for Shawn. Of course the couple would have the occasional argument (the first involved a shifted Shawn borrowing Kia's clothes for a job interview without asking), but for the most part the two lived together in paradise. In the months after Shawn's New Zealand job was done he'd had trouble getting big jobs, but Rebecca had gotten him little jobs in commercials and such here and there. But Shawn finally got a fairly big break with being hired as a stuntman for a live action team superhero show as one of the main stuntmen, and best of all he actually got to be himself for once. The pay was good enough so that he wasn't staved for work and got to sit back and spend his off time with Kia.

Unfortunately for him, (and fortunately for her), Kia was starting to make a name for herself in the faction world. A few celebrities had been seen wearing her dresses to premiers and that was all it took for Kia to get a pretty big fation show dedicated just to her work. Sadly for Shawn this seemed to be keeping Kia's attention about 12 hours a day 7 days a week. Shawn tried to spend time backstage with Kia, but even though he was the boyfriend the security wouldn't let him in back with Kia due to stupid security reasons.

So when he wasn't working (which was most of the time) Shawn was now spending most of his days just sitting back and watching tv while turning into what he saw on tv to keep himself entertained. Shawn heard the door slam open and shut so shifted from a basketball player into himself and called out, "Something wrong Kia?"

"NO! Everything is perfect, everything and everyone is freaking perfect!" Kia yelled out. Shawn walked into the kitchen where Kia had her head buried in her rolodex.

"Kia?" Shawn said cautiously.

"Sorry Shawn. I-I'm just flustered. I've got the big runway show tomorrow and three of my model's just up and quit after getting 'discovered.' I hope they enjoy whatever b movie they have to strip down in."

"Anything I can do?"

"Well, I'm trying to find at least one model who I can find at the last minute to replace three who happen to be the perfect sizes for the cloths. So unless you can find them you can't help."

Shawn just stood a little dumbfounded for a moment before becoming bemused, "Uh, Kia."

"What is it Shawn?" Kia said looking up and seeing a face from the past staring at her. "Why are you Shelly right now. You know I'm not in the mood for that kind of thing."

Shawn gave it Kia a minute to stop being so flustered and think straight. After a few seconds of silence Kia suddenly stopped looking through her notebooks and looked at Shawn with wide eyes. "You'd do that for me?"

"Do you really have to ask?" Shawn said before being feeling Kia's tongue being shoved in his mouth. Kia separated and said, "You know what, all of the sudden I am in the mood for 'that'."

And I plan to keep you forever!" she teased. Shelly's eyes widened before Kia burst with laughter. "Gullible much? As if I would do that to you!" exclaimed Kia, her face bright with mirth. 12323.content:
As Shawn quickly drove to the studio address Rebecca had sent him to. About a year ago Shawn used to be really nervous about this kind of thing, but he'd done it a few times by now so he knew the drill. He walked up the front desk and told the security, "I'm Chloe Reilly. I'm the 3:00." With the Shawn was waved into the office just like that.

When Shawn entered the room he noticed all of the posters on the wall of movies he'd seen before and saw a bunch of awards on the shelves. Good job Becca, looks like you got me a job with somebody legit, Shawn thought to himself. He was motioned to sit down by a formidable woman behind the desk. Shawn saw her nameplate on the desk and knew the name instantly. It was Beatrix Hoff, she was nicknamed the 'Queen of the B movie' but her latest indie darling flick that got her a directing nomination had given her enough credibility to get a major picture. Shawn saw that she was about 45 years old with greying hair pulled back in a very tight bun that seemed to stretch out the skin on her face. Shawn was a little weirded out by the site, but remembered this woman was his ticket to a big paycheck so he just sat down and looked polite. Beatrix watched Shawn closely as he sat down, never before had he been judged by the way he moved so closely. After watching Shawn sit down and taking down some notes she simply said, "Very good. I believe you will fit the part."

Shawn blinked, "Just like that? I mean, thank you very much mam."

"You handle yourself with grace under the situation, that is exactly what I need. I can tell by the way you move you have a graceful confidence that is required of this job. As a fellow woman I must say that you are very brave for what you'll be doing. Here is the contract, you'll begin on Sunday for a costume fitting and filming begins Monday and it should only take about 6 days for the various scenes with a chance for a few more in pick up."

Shawn couldn't help but blush as he signed the contract, "You're too kind."

Beatrix took the contract and handed Shawn a folder, "Thank you for what you're willing to put out there for the world to see, here is the script, the parts you'll be needed for are highlighted. Have a nice day."

Shawn gladly took the folder and left, when he got to his car he called Rebecca to tell her the good news. "Hey cuz, I got the job!" Shawn said excitedly.

"Wow, that's great news! I must you sound a lot more excited than I thought you'd be."

"What do you mean by that?" Shawn asked.

"It's just that I thought you wouldn't exactly be happy with the conditions."

Shawn froze, "What conditions?"

Rebecca let out an audible sigh, "Oh Shawn, please tell me you actually read the contract."

Shawn gulped, "What was on the contract?"

Rebecca said in an overly calming manner, "Oh, it's nothing. Not that big a deal it's just..."

"A nude scene, not a sex scene. There's a big difference." Rebecca corrected.

"I've seen enough movies to know that if a woman gets naked there is a good chance she's having sex with a dude. Let me check the script right here, I'm sure it's in here."

"Don't bother looking," Rebecca said taking a long pause, "There is a sex scene."

"What the hell Rebecca! If I wanted to use my powers to be a porn star I would have done it the second I moved here. And it would have been as a guy!" Shawn threw in.

"Ew ew, please just stop, I really don't want the image of my cousin giving himself a large penis." Rebecca sounded like she was about to throw up, "Anyways it's not a sex scene. Siobhan Reynolds has a no nudity clause in her contract so they needed a body double, I told them I had a girl who looked like her who would do it. All you have to do is some stripping."

"Just stripping? Is that all Becca?" Shawn said a bit skeptical, he could tell Rebecca wasn't telling him everything.

"Well, there will be...other things, just simple stuff like...rustling bedsheets and...naked hugging."

Shawn could only stare at his phone, "Did you really just say, 'naked hugging'?" Shawn couldn't help it, he let out a chuckle, although his body made it more of a cute giggle, "That's the dumbest thing you've ever said."

Rebecca also laughed, "Yeah, it was a bit silly. But that really is what it will be. You'll be naked, a naked guy will be there and they do some fancy camerawork, put Siobhan's face on you with computer graphics and it'll be done. Simple as that." Shawn was a little relived until she added, "I promise you won't be penetrated, I made sure that was in your contract."

"Gah, please don't talk about...penetrating. Not cool."

"Sorry, I owed you one for the porn star crack...but seriously, I put that in your contract."

"Well...thanks. So let me get this straight, for this movie I'm not even really a stuntman erm well stuntwoman. I'm a naked body double."

"Well I think there is a fight scene or two, but the main reason you got hired was the nudity thing."

"Great." Shawn said sarcastically, "Well, I'm going to do something manly for now to make up for being a small naked woman next week. Later." Shawn hung up the phone, drove to his apartment, and shifted back into being himself...with a little more muscles and other male enhancements to overcompensate for what he was going to do next week.

1232312.content:
After spending a considerable amount of time overcompensating (and getting blind drunk), Shaun showed up at the arranged address on Sunday morning and shielded his eyes from the sun as he looked at the outer facade of the building. "The things I do for money!" he sighed, gently shaking his head. He was back in his 'Chloe' form and was casually dressed in a grey t-shirt, a pair of denim shorts, socks and hi-tip sneakers. He had forgone wearing a dress that morning because he knew he'd be spending enough time in period costumes because of the nature of the film he'd be starring in.

"Mediaeval fantasy? What the hell does that mean anyway?" he thought, grimacing a little as his mind ticked over. "There gonna be Hobbits and Orcs and an old guy in a grey robe running around?" he chuckled away to himself. "Mind you...I wouldn't say no to a night in bed with one of those elves" he smirked.

A woman's voice suddenly snapped Shaun out of his trance; "Miss Reilly, if you please!" He glanced right slightly to see a stern looking Beatrix Hoff standing at the front gate waving him over.

"Oh er...good morning!" Shaun called out, before making his way over to her.

"You're late!" Beatrix scolded him upon entry.

Shaun frowned as he glanced at the ladie's gold watch on his slender wrist. "Only a couple of minutes" he countered.

"I'm sure if you spent less time daydreaming you would be on time for your appointments young lady" Beatrix said as she locked the gate. "Now go into that building over there and let Sarah know you're here. She's the costume designer for the film." she directed Shaun towards a structure on the right. "She'll make sure all your costumes fit properly"..

Shaun kept the statement he had in his head to himself; "From what I hear I won't be wearing many costumes." Instead he just smiled at Beatrix and gently shook her hand, thanking her for her 'help'.

"Sarah will accompany you back to see me when you're done" the 'Hoff' then nodded firmly, because striding off.

"Wow! Somebody's got a stick up her ass!" Shaun mumbled, pulling a face before heading over to his destination, the 'Wardrobe Department'. "Hello?" he called out in his female voice after knocking on the door and wandering in. He didn't see anyone, and so he decided to have a poke around. The strong smell of fabric and dust filled his nostrils as he made his way through the room, which was packed with mannequins, some dressed...some not. "HELLO?" he called out again, this time louder. Still there was no answer. Then he caught sight of a corset on one of the mannequins, and his faced contorted as he imagined being squeezed into it. "Oh please no!" he mumbled. And on the next mannequin over was a long, elegant dress, low-cut and crimson red with a gold floral pattern. To Shaun's eye it looked as uncomfortable as the corset, despite its beauty.

Suddenly someone appeared behind Shaun and tapped him on the shoulder, making his squeal in a very girly fashion.

12323122.content:
"Woah...sorry!! Didn't mean to startle you sweetheart" the man standing before Shaun said, raising his hands gently.

Shaun let out a deep sigh as his heart resumed its place, he just stood there with a hand resting in between his B-cup breasts "Sweetheart?" was the first thing he thought, annoyed at the man's condescending tone. "Its alright, I just...didn't think anyone was here" Shaun replied.

"I've just finished my fitting session. Probably my most least favorite part of being an actor" the man laughed, gesturing in the direction of a back room. "Anyway, where are my manners, I'm Tom!" he introduced himself, gently shaking Shaun's dainty hand.

"I'm...er...Chloe!" Shaun muttered, forgetting his 'pretend' name for a moment. He smiled sheepishly.

The man returned the smile. "Pleased to meet you Chloe!" he nodded. Shaun studied the man for a moment and arched an eyebrow in apparent approval.

"If I were a real chick I'd probably go for his sort" he mused. Tom was definitely good looking, and Shaun didn't doubt for a minute he could melt any woman's heart with his boyish charm if he wanted. But not Shaun's heart, "No way dude!" he thought.

"I assume you're here for a fitting too?" Tom then inquired, being nosey.

Shaun just nodded his reply. Then he glanced around, wondering where this Sarah was. "Yeah, I'm er...I'm the body double for Siobhan Reynolds in some Mediaeval fantasy flick or something" he then mumbled to Tom, rolling his eyes.

"You're kidding??" Tom exclaimed. "I'm the lead in that film!" he stated, breaking out in a chuckle.

Shaun just slipped his hands into the back pockets of his denim shorts and his eyes widened as he again looked Tom over. "Oh boy!" he muttered under his breath.
12323122.title: It was somebody else.

123231221.content:
"So, you're here to try on some costumes, or lack there of," Tom said with a laugh as Shawn gave a very visible shudder. Shawn's discomfort was so obvious even Tom noticed, his laughter subsided instantly, "Okay, we're not joking about that. Got it."

"Yeah, I'm not. I really don't want to think about that scene. It just feels wildly uncomfortable." Shawn said honestly before remembering who he was talking to, "Uh, no offense."

"None taken," Tom said, "So, I take it this is your first time?"

"Kinda," Shawn said looking for the costume designer, How long do I have to keep up with the awkward conversation? Shawn thought, "I mean I've done plenty of stunt work before, just not like...you know."

"Okay, I get it. First time with a nude scene. I've been there and it was awkward as hell. But it was only that bad because I made it that bad, it really isn't that big a deal, it's just a job and we're both professionals. But if you're still feeling nervous, we can practice if you want." Tom laughed as Shawn gave another shudder, "Sorry, bad joke. But seriously, if you want to talk about stuff feel free to talk to me about it."

"Thanks, I might do that." Shawn said as the costume lady Sarah finally entered the room. She looked at Tom and said, "I thought I finished with you a half hour ago. Get out of here and leave the poor girl alone so I can get my measurements."

"I was just on my way out, I'll see you at the shoot tomorrow Chloe."

"Yeah, see you then." Shawn said. He was kinda confused, at first he thought Tom was just hitting on him, but maybe he was just being a nice guy and he came off a little strong, Am I just being paranoid about that? Maybe I should talk to Rebecca about it. Shawn thought as Sarah snapped her fingers.

"Earth to Chloe. I know you're in lala land after meeting the big movie star, but I need you to strip down."

"Already?"

"Just to your underwear, I need as accurate a measurement as I can get." Shawn began to strip behind a screen, "Come on Chloe, I'm going to see you without the cloths anyway, it's not like you're saving yourself for Tom."

Somebody's a little catty. Shawn thought as he stripped down and thought about the conversation he'd just had while Sarah practically tied him up with measuring tape.

"Well, the director has a good eye for bodies, you're a perfect match for Siobhan measurements. I'll have your dress ready for the fight scene tomorrow."
123231221.title: "Don't discuss the naked scenes!"

123231222.content:
"Oh, hello," came a female voice from outside the room. Shawn felt an enormous relief as he turned to see the approaching woman. She had long blonde hair and was clad in a tank top, a long skirt, and perhaps a bit too much makeup. That aside, Shawn considered her quite attractive.

"Oh, there you are," Tom said at the sight of her. "This cute little thing's here to see you."

Who are you calling a thing? Shawn thought.

"Nice to meet you," the woman said, shaking Shawn's hand. "I'm Sarah, and you are...?"

"Chloe Reilly," Shawn replied. He mentally scrambled to confirm he had gotten the last name right.

"Well, I'll leave you ladies alone," Tom said, offering a cocky smile and a dismissive wave. "Look forward to seeing more of you, babe!" he added as he made his way out. Shawn nearly gagged at the comment.

Sarah watched Tom leave before turning to address Shawn. "Now, you're Siobhan's body double, right? Of course you are; my eyes are telling me that. So... how do you like the lead?" she asked in a little too suggestive a tone.

"He thinks he's God's gift to women, doesn't he?" Shawn said, glaring in the direction Tom had left.

Sarah laughed. "Well, I wouldn't disagree with him! You're lucky, you know. I wish I could do your job!"

"I'd trade with you in a heartbeat, I assure you," Shawn flatly replied.

"Really?" Sarah asked, raising an eyebrow. "If you're that shy, why did you take this role?"

"I was desperate," Shawn sighed. It was true enough; he'd have accepted the job even if he'd known what he was getting into.

"Well, you're not getting any pity from me, sister!" Sarah said as she approached a rack of clothing and began to rummage through it. "You're gonna solve your money problems and all you have to do is rub up against a hot guy."

"Yeah. Great," Shawn grumbled.

"Oh, relax. It doesn't have to mean anything, you know. Anyway, we're here about the parts where you have clothes on." Sarah turned her head back and examined Shawn with an unsettling stare. "Let's see... are those B-cups you've got there?"

"Er... yes?" Shawn replied, suddenly not as sure about it as he'd been before, as it occurred to him he hadn't checked their exact size. He raised an arm halfway to his chest before stopping himself.

"Well, don't you sound confident. It's important to know, you know. Well, we'll figure it out." Sarah kneeled down to peruse an assortment of shoes on the floor, most of which Shawn didn't fancy wearing. "Hey, think you can run in heels?"

Shawn was glad Sarah couldn't see his eyes widen. "Umm..."

"That sounds like a no. It'd be nice if you could, but don't worry about it."

As Shawn considered what she was implying, he turned his gaze back to the red dress on display and made a connection. "So I have to do action scenes in a dress?"

"Haven't you looked at the script?" Sarah chided him. "It's sort of required reading for an actress, you know."

"At least tell me I don't have to wear this," Shawn said, motioning to the corset.

"Only so you can take it off!" Sarah laughed, prompting a groan from Shawn. She stood up, having set aside a few dresses and pairs of shoes, and picked up a roll of measuring tape before approaching Shawn. "Okay, take your shirt off and let me measure you." Seeing him jump a little, she pointedly added, "You can't possibly object."

"R-right..." Shawn muttered. He pulled his shirt over his head and dumped it on a nearby chair. Sarah promptly wrapped the measuring tape around his waist.

"You've got nothing to worry about, you know," she said. "We're all professionals here." Shawn couldn't reply, as his focus was spent stifling his reaction to Sarah's touch on his smooth skin as she continued to measure various parts of his body. He certainly didn't have to worry about feeling anything for Tom.

Eventually Sarah finished her task and pulled away from Shawn. "Close!" she remarked. "You certainly are a good double."

"Um, thanks?" Shawn replied, appreciating the unwitting compliment on his abilities.

"Thank your parents!" Sarah joked.

At that Shawn found himself wondering, for the thousandth time, where his powers had come from. Of course, he had no more answers than he had the previous nine hundred and ninety-nine times. But what he really wished he could know was whether there were others like him in the world. For all he knew he could have met one. Or several.

While he was in thought, Sarah returned to rack of clothes and picked out a dress which, as far as Shawn could tell, was identical to the one displayed on the mannequin. "Alright, try this on," she said.

Not bothering to remove his shorts, Shawn took the dress and easily slipped into it, but couldn't quite get it to stay in place around his chest. "Hmm, a little loose at the top," Sarah noted.

"No, uh, hang on a second..." Shawn turned away from Sarah and pretended to fiddle with the dress as he subtly morphed his bust to better fill it. "There we go," he said, turning back with the dress now fitting snugly.

"Huh," Sarah breathed. A muted reaction, but enough to make Shawn realise that what he just did wasn't exactly wise. He mentally chided himself for acting on his impatience to get this over with. Still, he seemed to have gotten away with it.

After a few more costume fittings (and a demonstration that he could barely even walk in high heels - he'd need to practice that), Shawn and Sarah prepared to leave the Wardrobe Department.

"Another shapeshifter!" was his initial reaction, but then Sarah disappointed him a little. "Oh there's Siobhan now, perfect time to introduce you" she chirped. "Miss Reynolds!" And we can get to know each other a little too. Sarah, will you tell 'the Hoff' that I'm giving Chloe some lessons please" she then said.

"Sure thing!" Sarah replied with a nod.

Suddenly Shaun found himself being led away by Siobhan, and he just turned and smiled nervously at Sarah, waving at her. "Thank you!" he mimed. "This should be interesting!" he then mused, as they headed towards Siobhan's dressing room in a singular structure nearby.

12323122221.content:
Once inside her dressing room, Siobhan closed the door and walked immediately over to her wardrobe. "Make yoruself comfortable" she told Shaun, her voice a little muffled as she ducked into the wardrobe. "I take it we're the same size...right?" she then called out.

Shaun thought for a moment, then quickly removed one of his hi-top sneakers. "Uh...size...5?" he muttered in response.

"Yep!" Siobhan said.

Deciding he may as well take his other sneaker off, Shaun removed it and then stared down at his feminine, sock-covered feet. He wiggled his toes and smirked a little before looking back up as Siobhan returned to him carrying two pairs of her shoes. "Okay, we'll start off easy okay, here!" she said to Shaun, thrusting a pair of 1-inch 'kitten-heel' pumps towards him. He took hold of them and let out a sigh, he was not looking forward to this.

"Then providing you can master those, we step it up" Siobhan then giggled, as she held up a pair of her black & red, 4-inch heel, louboutin pumps.

Shaun's eyes widened at the sight of the sky-high heels. "Huh...yeah, 911 on standby!" he chuckled nervously.

Siobhan dismissed his quip with a wave of her hand. "You'll be fine! We're the same build, and if I can walk in these things then so can you" she said. "Besides, its nice to have a little extra height when you're stood next to the guys" she laughed.

"I suppose!" Shaun nodded, as he sat down and removed his socks, revealing his slender feet.

"You don't paint?" Siobhan inquired, and for a moment Shaun wondered what the hell she was talking about. Then he realized she was referring to his toe-nails, which were void of any nail polish whatsoever.

"Er...no, not my thing!" Shaun answered with a disapproving shake of his head.

Shaun frowned as he slipped his feet into the kitten-heel pumps, which were just a shade too tight for him, but as before...he subtly shrank his feet ever so slightly until they fit snug in the shoes. "Perfect fit!" he said to Siobhan, who was stood over him. He then outstretched his feminine legs and put his feet together, studying his temporary new footwear.

"Okay, on your feet honey" Siobhan 'ordered' him, gesturing with a finger.

Doing as he was told, Shaun stood up and began pacing the room slowly. After an initial stumble, he seemed to handle the kitten heels fairly well. But it was his walk that Siobhan seemed to pay attention to the most. "You walk like a guy!" she told him bluntly, before smirking a little. "I mean...not a big, butch 'I'm gonna kick your ass' kinda guy, but you've definitely got a bit of a swagger going on" she added.

Shaun just shrugged and smiled, unsure what to say. If only she knew the truth.

What followed over the next 20 minutes was a pain-staking, repetative routine of walking back and fourth, learning to walk like a 'lady'. But the more feminine Shaun's walk got...the easier he found it to walk in the 1-inch kitten heeled pumps. And Siobhan was delighted to see her teaching was paying off.
12323122221.title: Solving the 'heel problem'.

123231222212.content:
Shaun was about to change into Siobhan’s louboutin pumps when suddenly the phone started ringing. “Be right back sweetie” she said, handing her heels off to him, and he just held them in his hands, studying them. “How do they walk in these things?” Shaun thought as a frown appeared on his face again.

Shaun then sat down and kicked off the kitten heels he was wearing, and slipped his feet into the louboutin pumps. Wearing them wasn’t a problem, but walking in them would be. Still, he had to admit they made his legs look even sexier.

“Okay, we’ll have to pick this up later,” Siobhan suddenly said, making Shaun look up. “That was the Hoff, she wants to see us both” she added.

Shaun opened his up and took a glance, and as he already knew…he had no lines per say, since he wasn’t an actor…or actress in this case. But from reading the script he got to know when his scene with Tom would be. And he then began to get butterflys in his stomach.

“You’ll be fine!” Siobhan whispered in reassurance, seeing how uncomfortable ’Chloe’ was.

“Yeah, I hope so” Shaun sighed, taking a deep breath.

1232312222121.title: Costume time.

1233.content:
"Jesus. I thought she said I'd be shapeshifting into a woman," Shawn muttered to himself as he glanced at his phone. The woman on the image was no actress, she was a female bodybuilder, three times Ms Olympia Champion, Olga Dubrovsky. The picture Becca had sent was of her on stage at the 2010 finals in Las Vegas, flexing powerful biceps, her bronzed body of taut, bulging muscle and sinew gleaming beneath a thick layer of oil. She wore a scrap of a thong and a bikini top that looked out of place on her non-existent breasts. She had a square jaw, a broad nose that seemed to take up most of her face, and drab, blonde hair that hung in limp coils around her face.

According to the statistics that captioned the image, she stood at 6'2.5 and was in the heavyweight category. He could believe that.

"She's built like a brick bomb shelter, surely she can do her own stunts," Shawn wondered. Still, never look a gift horse in the mouth. Already he was unconsciously shifting to match her physique. His spine stretched inch by inch, and his hips widened. Muscles grew beneath his skin, and his face began to slowly resemble her blunt features. Shawn wandered through into his bathroom and stood in front of the mirror. He shifted his gaze back and forth between the phone and his reflection as he gradually shifted his body and face to match Olga's. Normally he shifted into an identical copy of the actor or actress he would be doubling for then tweaked it, just enough to look different, but close enough to bear a remarkable resemblance. Half-way through the transformation, as his spine stretched and his shoulders broadened, he realised he was at risk of tearing his shirt. He paused the changes long enough to squirm out of his now-tight clothing, and continued morphing in the nude.

Olga was not a pretty woman by any stretch of the imagination. He eased up a little on the musculature, though concerned that it made him look too feminine (actresses never liked it when their stunt doubles were prettier than themselves) he added extra droop to his boobs and buttocks.

Adding the final touches, he rang Becca.

That evening at home Shawn was putting the final touches to his make-up, and Rebecca was there to help him with his outfit selection. "So have you decided yet? The blue dress or the green one?" Rebecca asked him, as he glanced at her through the mirror while applying his lipstick. "Personally...I like the blue one, it'll suit that body of yours better" Rebecca then said, giving her two cents worth.

"What's wrong with the green one?" Shawn asked, as he puckered his lips, slightly turned on by his own reflection.

"Too...grannified!" Rebecca replied, holding up the aforementioned dress.

Shawn smiled. "Okay, I'll take your expert advice" he told Rebecca, before walking over to her. He took hold of the blue dress and wasted no time slipping into it. Rebecca zipped it up in back and then Shawn adjusted himself repeatedly until he was pleased with the way it felt on him. "God, these...things are nice, but they get in the way all the time" he grumbled, as he mashed his boobs together and pulled on his dress until his cleavage looked 'perfect'.

"My heart bleeds!" Rebecca muttered acerbically.

Shawn looked at Rebecca and frowned, unimpressed with her response.

"Just suck it up!" she snapped at Shawn. "You were the one who asked that girl out on a date, so you can only blame yourself if you're feeling nervous" she told him. "Just remember not to let your mind wander, otherwise you'll be shapeshifting again right in front of her" she warned.

"Gotcha!" Shawn nodded, as he slipped his feet into a pair of black patent pumps.

"Right, you ready?" Rebecca asked.

"Er...just a minute!" Shawn mumbled a response, grabbing his new black purse. "Okay, ready!" he nodded. "Oh and thanks for giving me a lift" he said to his friend.

"Couldn't let you walk there in those heels now could I? You'd be crippled!" Rebecca smiled at him, gesturing down to the 4-inch stilettos he was wearing. "Now come on, I have to get home too you know, I'll drop you off then head home" she said. They got in the car together and the vehicle sped off towards the popular Dolphinarium discotheque, where Natalie was waiting patiently for her date...Kristen.

1332122221221211221111.content:
Shawn knew that tomorrow he'd probably be practising his stunts again, and so he wanted to enjoy himself tonight. Strutting into the club confidently on his 4-inch stiletto heels, he immediately got the attention of a number of men. He smirked at them and then ventured further inside the club. The din of the music drowned out almost every other noise as he looked around the room, strobe lights made it hard to distinguish faces. "Hey babe...how about we have some fun?" a drunken guy suddenly said as he came up behind Shawn and grabbed hold of his breasts. "How about I cripple you for a while?" Shawn mumbled in response, immediately kicking one of his shapely legs up behind him and connecting with the guy's 'junk'. A loud groan and the sound of a body hitting the floor was just audible as Shawn walked off, leaving the guy in agony.

After five minutes of searching, Shawn located his new girlfriend, Natalie, over by the bar. She smiled at 'Kristen' as she approached her and they kissed. "Hey sweetheart, how are you?" Shawn asked, as they got to talking. And during the conversation he revealed to Natalie that he was a 'stunt girl', and she seemed impressed.

"You're gonna have to let me watch you practise some day" Natalie cooed, resting her hand on Shawn's silky-smooth thigh.

"I'd like that!" he nodded, pushing his hair from his face.

Even while he was talking to her, Shawn felt guilty, he was in effect lying to the girl, pretending to be someone...and something he wasn't. He thought about telling her the truth, but he knew she would probably flip out and it would all be over. Could he take the risk?

"You want a drink? My treat!" Natalie chirped.

"Oooh...yes please, I'm parched" was Shawn's response, as he licked his painted lips.

Shawn found his sexy new form swaying to the beat of the house music filling his ears and almost making the very room shake. He normally avoided places like this, but Natalie hgad suggested it as a meeting place for them. He couldn't say no.

No, he shook the idea from his head. There was no way he could expose his secret to a girl he'd known only a few short hours. Even telling his cousin had been a risk. If it ever got out that he was a shapeshifter, he'd be being sliced open in some government laboratory faster than he could blink.

"Is there something you want to tell me?" Natalie asked, pulling him away from thoughts of surgical scalpels, back to the here and now. He realised she must have read the expression on his face.

"It's...nothing."

"Go on, you can tell me." She leaned in, lowering her voice to a conspiratorial whisper, which was actually more of a quiet shout in the loudness of the club. "Let me guess: you're bi, right?" Shawn goggled, amazed that somebody could be so far wide of the mark. "I saw you looking," she smirked conspiratorially, jerking her head at the two teenage boys who were pretending not to hear. "It's okay, I am too."

Shawn's jaw dropped open. "I'm not bi! I'm straight. I mean gay!" he corrected himself hurriedly, wondering how strong that last drink had been. "Just girls."

His date looked taken aback. "But you were flirting with them."

"I was not!"

"You were a little," Dave spoke up over Natalie's shoulder.

"Shut it, Dave!" Shawn snapped. Although now that he thought back, maybe he had done the thing where he shrughed his shoulders in such a way as to squeeze his breasts together. But with breasts like these in a dress like this, it's hard not to!

"So what was it you were going to tell me?" Natalie pressed. For some reason, she seemed to be growing annoyed at Shawn's refusal to tell her the secret he had been on the cusp of speaking.

"Nothing!" he exclaimed. "It's not important."

Frowning a little and collecting her purse, Natalie rose from her seat and excused herself. Shawn watched her walk to the toilets and shook his head in confusion. "Even as a girl I still don't understand women," he sighed.

"You should date guys; we're much simpler," Scott grinned, wasting no time in sliding into the free seat next to Shawn.

Shawn hit him with a withering stare. "Nice try but, trust me, it's not going to work."

Scott flashed his boyish smile. "Can't blame a guy for trying, huh?"

"Keep it up and I just might," he replied dryly, taking a swig from his beer. Scott backed off momentarily, but Shawn could see the cogs turning in his mind as the young man weighed up risk vs potential payoff.

"Are all lesbians as uptight as you?" he ventured.

Despite himself, Shawn laughed. Wow, he actually tried it. "You're right. I should really learn to relax. I should be open to new ideas, like having a threesome with my girlfriend and some skater guy we picked up in a club," he said sarcastically. Scott retreated into his drink, blushing a little, and Shawn almost took pity on him. "Look, you seem like a nice enough guy... sort of. But I'm just not into men. At all. They don't do anything for me. They're all hard and pointy, eugh, while girls are soft and squishy and nice. I'm appealing to your masculinity to understand this."

Scott met his gaze; even at the words 'soft and squishy' he valiantly refused his eyes from drifting southwards, though his left eye did twitch somewhat. Shawn decided to interpret this as a sign of understanding and respect, and the two of them sat in silence for some minutes, until the bartender arrived to collect their glasses. Scott leaned in closer. "She's got a nice ass."

"Finally something we can agree on."

Half an hour later, the conversation was still orbiting the bartender's exemplary rear, though had also taken in such topics as breasts, legs, hair colour, and ethnicity. Shawn found himself opening up quite frankly about his own tastes and laughing frequently at Scott's often tasteless anecdotes. So engrossed was he in the stimulating debate around nipple sizes, that it was only when he looked up to see Natalie tongue-wrestling with Dave against the bar that he realised she had returned from the toilets some time ago.

"Oh..."

Shopping was about as hellish to Shawn as he'd imagined. Rebecca practically dragged him store to store picking up a top or two here, a skirt or two there, a few sets of underwear, finally culminating in a trip to the shoe store where Rebecca had gotten a small mountain's worth of shoes for Shawn to try on.

"I still can't believe I just spent the day shopping for freaking skirts." Shawn said slipping his delicate tootsies into what felt like the 50th pair of sandals that looked to his eye to be just like the last 49.

"Then why couldn't you have just sent home for your old cloths, you could have told your folks you were donating them or something and in a way you would have been. I could have made myself fit in them no problem."

"Shelly, I grew up in the early 2000's, times and fashions have changed drastically. Or do you think it would have looked good for a young hip stuntgirl showing up in a Backstreet Boys t-shirt."

"We could have said it was retro." Shawn said knowing that Rebecca did have a kinda valid point. "So we're going with Shelly for this body? Sure why not."

"Yes, I've already sent off for the fake ID's, you should have it by tomorrow. You'll be Shelly Perry, my younger niece who is staying with me for a few weeks and wants to try to get into showbiz while she's here."

"Great, after we're done shopping we can go to your apartment so can get a few essentials and then we can drop them all off at my place." Rebecca said pulling even more shoe boxes off of the shelves.

"Yeah, wait. What?" Shawn said confused.

"Well you are currently 16, you can't be expected to be living on your own."

There were a few incidents where neighbors would come to the door and complain about the noise, but Shawn would say he was sorry and turn on the puppy dog eyes and came up with a sap story about needing to practice to make the team and everyone who would complain would melt like butter before his eyes.

Shawn suddenly noticed that he unconsciously fiddled with his short skirt. A habit that probably resulted in him not being that used to wearing skirts. Sure, the last couple of weeks he only wore them and he was kind of used to them BUT he was mostly at home practicing cheerleading moves and not out in public where everyone could see him. And not in front of Andrea Anderson!
134221211.title: The actress he was stunting for

choices: Shawn and Rob just have a fun time
Shawn decides that he wants to tease and mess with Rob some more
134221212.content:
The director slowly paired off everyone, giving each pairing their own individual pep talk before he finally came to Shawn. Before the director got to Shawn he paired off the lead actress Shawn was stunting for with the lead actor leaving only Shawn and the actor's stuntman left. The director walked up to Shawn and the boy and said, "Now Shelly. Robert. Your partnership will be the most important pairing on this entire shoot. The chemistry that the two of you must show during the routines will have to be perfect. You two must move and think as one cohesive unit. You must be like water. The two of you will make or break this film. Now you two get to know each other. Rehearsal starts tomorrow morning. Good luck."

The director walked away leaving Shawn and the guy standing there awkwardly. "No pressure." Shawn said and extended his arm, "I guess I'm Shelly."

The boy shook Shawn's arm, "And I'm Rob, pleased to meet you." After releasing the handshake Shawn said, "So...I wasn't paying much attention to what the director was saying, but it sounded like we're getting paid to hang out with each other."

"Sounds like it," Rob said, "If you want we can get changed and head over to my place, it's only a few blocks away and I've got a game system that can stream movies."

"Or we could play video games." Shawn said. He hadn't gotten to play any video games since he'd been forced to move in with his cousin a few weeks ago.

"Sure. Sounds great. I'm just going to get out of these lame cheerleader clothes."

"At least you have real clothes to change out of. I feel like I'm wearing a towel." Shawn noticed him saying this seemed to have left Rob blushing and speechless. Shawn chuckled to himself as he realized he could have some fun potentially teasing this kid. "I'll meet to at the entrance Rob."

"Sure." Rob said and the two went to their own dressing rooms and changed into street clothes before they met at the entrance.
134221212.title: Spending time with a stuntguy

choices: Actually it's not a dog, but a cat
It's a sports playing golden retriever
Not a canine, but a primate
14.content:
"They want you to be an animal again." Rebecca said into the phone waiting for the blow up.

"I'm hanging up now." Shawn said disgustedly into the phone.

"Wait wait, no! Just listen to me. I know that at the last shoot it was bad..."

"Bad?!" Shawn said all of the sudden getting angry, "I spent a straight week as a dog. They kept me in a cage that was way too small, the production crew got the cheapest dog food they could find, and that stupid hockey rink was absurdly cold. And, oh yeah, the movie didn't even get released so I didn't even get my full pay. So no. I'm not going through that again."

"Please wait! I told the studio about our 'dogs' last experience and I made sure that those conditions won't happen again. I've already got the contract right in front of me and it's a good deal with full pay unless you're fired and all the best conditioning for you that they could afford."

Shawn's every instinct was telling him to just hang up, but he did need the job and knew Rebecca would make sure he wasn't treated as poorly as he was before. "Go on."

"Thank you for taking this job,"

"I haven't accepted it yet, I'm just considering it. Now, what's the job."

"Come on, if you take it you'll get all the bitches you can handle."

Shawn groaned, she had made the exact same joke the last time she'd gotten him a dog job. "Hardy har har, stop beating around the bush and tell me the job."

"You'll be..."
14.title: Dog gone luck

choices: You'll be one of the bitches
The shoot will last a month
You're part will have a real action scenes in it
143.content:
