"A show poodle." Shawn repeated into the phone, "Seriously?" he asked still not sure he heard his cousin right.

"Yes a show poodle." Rebecca said, "Look, I know it's not the most masculine dog in the world, but the studio was looking for a poodle with almost human intelligence. When I heard the almost human part, you immediately came to my mind." Rebecca added trying to lighten up Shawn who she knew wouldn't be happy about the gig.

"But, come on. I'm going to be all dolled up and pranced around a ring. That's not what I am. I'm a stuntman."

"Who is going to get paid very well for what is, for once, a very safe job. I even made sure that you will actually get real meat in your meals as opposed to that dry stuff you hated last time."

"Rebecca. I don't want safe. I don't care about safe. I didn't get into this industry to be safe. I want to be in danger, I want fire, I want fighting. I don't want to...prance."

Some silence came from Rebecca's end. Shawn immediately felt bad about what he'd said. Rebecca was only doing what she thought was best and wanted to keep him safe. I really should have put that more nicely. "He I'm sorry. You're right, it'll be nice to have a job where I'm actually not in danger." Rebecca still didn't respond, "Come on Rebecca," Shawn continued, "I'm sure I can make it a fun week of shooting. I'll be the big dog on campus. I'll get all the bitches I want. Huh?" Shawn said hoping he bad jokes would make Rebecca feel better.

After a few more seconds of silence Rebecca hesitantly said "Actually..."
143.title: Shawn the show poodle

choices: "I'm your 'handler' so you can just go home."
"You'll be staying with a handler hired by the studio."
"The studio wants you to stay in a specialize kennel."
1431.content:
"Actually you'll be one of the bitches." Rebecca said into the phone. She managed to hold back a giggle because she knew that it could possible set Shawn off.

"Oh come on!" Shawn said exasperated, "Why the hell would the studio need to be so specific with something like that, it shouldn't matter the gender of the damn dog so long as it's displaying that human like intelligence they want. What do they want to do, show close ups of dog crotches or something?"

"I'm sorry Shawn, but the studio was very specific in what they are looking for and I didn't want to argue the silly little point of gender and risk losing the contract."

"My gender is not a 'silly little point'. It's kind of a big deal to me. A very big deal." Shawn said into the phone.

"I'm sure it is." Rebecca said calmly, "But it's a little bit of a dry spell as far as stuntwork goes, I'm guessing they aren't filming Hollywood blockbusters for a few months so we have to take what we get and this is what we have. You want to be able to pay the rent don't you?"

Shawn reluctantly said, "Yeah I guess."

"Good. Now let me give you some more details." Shawn could here Rebecca fumbling with some papers over the phone, "Okay, the shoot will be nice and simple. It lasts 5 days with a 2 day training period for the dog aka you. Meaning you will be a dog for 7 days."

"That's not too bad." Shawn said glad that it wouldn't be too long, but he also had another question in mind, "Where will I be when I'm not shooting or training? Will I have a handler?" Shawn said this thinking back to his last shoot as a dog where he'd been left with a really crummy handler who kept him under surveillance so he had to be stuck in dog form the entire shoot, and Shawn was really not looking forward to working under the same circumstances again.

Rebecca answered, "Oh, about that..."
1431.title: Shawn can be a bitch...literally

choices: That sounds lame, skip to the job without practicing
14313.content:
"What do you mean 'specialized kennel?'" Shawn asked.

"From what they described to me, they are taking an old gymnasium and installing natural lighting, grass, trees, and places for you and the other dogs to play in. When you aren't training or on the set, you'll be in this gym left free to roam with the other dogs. Outside of having food dropped off you'll be left on your own to do as you please."

"Well, it's better than being stuck in a cage I suppose. Hell I might be able to find something to do to have a good time. So, when does the job start?"

"Next week, but don't spend your downtime doing nothing Shawn." Rebecca said, her voice suddenly becoming stern. "I want you to spend a few hours a day practicing being a dog and..."

"Come on Becca, I've been a dog before. I know what to do."

"Not being a show dog. I want you to look up videos online of dog show competitions and such so you can practice. It'll make me and our business look bad if you don't look professional."

"How hard could it be." Shawn said kind of insulted at what his cousin was asking him to do.

"Just promise me."

"Fine. I promise."

"Great, you work on that and I'll work on looking for more work after that's done. I'll pick you up next week to drop you off at the job."

"Okay, see you next week." Shawn said as he hung up the phone. As soon as he hung up the phone he went to the computer to do some image searching on poodles to find get a form in his head for what he's going to be like on the job. As soon as he found a few pictures he was content with he sat back and wondered if he should do as his cousin suggested and look up dog show videos so he could practice.
14313.title: Shawn will be left to fend for himself

choices: It goes well, it's not that hard to pick up on
Poorly, Shawn really should have practiced his technique
143132.content:
After 15 minutes of looking at pictures and dog show videos before Shawn started getting bored. "What the hell am I doing? I've been a dog before. I don't need to train to one. I've been doing this for years. I'll show her practice." With that Shawn shut down his laptop and went to the park for some jogging.

Now when most people went out for a jog the only thing they'd have to worry about is what color shirt they want to wear or what playlist to put on their mp3 player. For Shawn not only did he have to decide on these things but also things like gender, race, height, or even species. Luckily for Shawn he didn't care that much so for the next week whenever Shawn wasn't at home relaxing, he spent his time running in the park in whatever form he was feeling that day. Although the day before the job started Shawn did spend one of his daily jogs in the park as a dog in order to fulfill Rebecca's desire for him to 'practice'. As male golden retriever with was nothing like a female poodle, but still a dog none the less. I'll be spending enough time in that body, no need to get a needless head start. Shawn rationalized to himself as he put on his collar with his cousin's address on it just in case he got into trouble with dog catchers (can never be too safe) and ran off to the park.

He usually enjoyed his daily run but today he couldn't help but get distracted by the little things. Like the way one dog owner covered up his dog's crap with leaves as opposed to picking it up. Or the way a large doberman was dragging along his young and petite female owner. And even the way a large male dog would hump a smaller female one. Shawn shook his dog head well I know which one of those I'm not going to let happen Shawn thought to himself as he finished his run and made his way back to his apartment. As soon as he got back he made sure nobody was around with his now keen senses of smell and hearing and picked up his hidden door key with his mouth and maneuver the key into the lock and turned it.

"Why the hell do I need to practice being a smart dog? I'm going to be the smartest damn dog they've ever come across." Shawn laughed to himself as shifted back into his normal form.
____________________________________________

The next day Shawn woke up to a loud banging on his door. Reluctantly Shawn stood up and answered the knocking of his cousin who entered without saying a word.

"Hello to you too," Shawn said grumpily.

"Oh sorry Shawn. It's just I've been busy this morning getting the last of the paperwork forged for you." Rebecca said opening up a breifcase with many files of forged paperwork for Shawn from over the last few years. "Here it is. You are a pure bred, fully vaccinated, white poodle named Sasha."

"Sasha? Well I guess it could be worse." Shawn said gulping down a soda to start his day.

"I've got your measurements here." Rebecca said handing him a full on diagram of 'Sasha's' dimensions.

"You've really gone full out on this one haven't you."

"I'm getting better and part of me getting better is getting more details. Now hurry up and change, I want to grab some breakfast before I drop you off."

"Come on, I don't have to be there for a few more hours."

"Yes but I want to see what you've worked on this week. You have been working right?"

"Sure." Shawn lied, but Rebecca could see through it.

"Damn it Shawn. This is a big movie for us and could really put us on the map as an agency. I don't want you to screw this up for us."

"I won't I won't. I promise. Now if you'll give me a second I need to go get familiar with myself." Shawn said as he took the diagram into the bathroom. Shawn spent a few minutes looking at the diagram making sure he had every little nook and cranny down. Shawn stripped off his cloths to avoid them ripping and started his shift. It took a few minutes as he wanted to get every detail with as far as the muscles and such were concerned, they had to be perfect for him to pull of being a top class show dog off. Something else that took a whole lot more time than normal was the hair. Normally when he shifted Shawn would just let his hair do what ever it wanted to do. But with the poodle he had to be very careful to shape and place the hair to form those poofy patterns. Nice, didn't know I could do that. Shawn thought to himself, impressing even himself with his ability to craft his body. After the shift was completed Shawn opened the door with his paws for a final inspection from Rebecca.

"I know you're supposed to be a very smart dog, but leave the door opening to the humans okay Sasha?" Rebecca said as she bent down to get a good look at Shawn, "Don't give me that look. You're going to have to get used to being called that for the next week." She spent a minute going over him and comparing it to the chart. "Looking good, but I do notice one little problem." With that Rebecca put a grasp around Shawn's groin region which made Shawn whimper a little. "You're supposed to be a girl dog Shawn, did you really think I wouldn't notice?"

Kinda hoped so. Shawn thought as he shifted his doggy genitalia from male to female. "Much better Sasha." Rebecca said as she attached a pink and bejeweled leash to Shawn's neck. "Now let's get you to work?"

But how will Shawn's first day of training for the movie go?
143132.title: Practice Schmactice

choices: That evening the dogs want to play
That evening a trainer comes to play
1431322.content:
As soon as Rebecca dropped Shawn off at the revamped gymnasium the first thought that ran though Shawn's head was I thought we were going inside? Somehow the studio had revamped the entire facility to look, feel, and even smell like a park. The only way Shawn was able to tell the difference from his position was the lack of a sun and clouds when he looked up at the sky like ceiling. Shawn was trying to get a good look around at the room to figure out some more of the logistics of it when all of the sudden THWACK! Shawn recoiled as he looked up at the large African American gentleman who held a rolled up newspaper in his hand.

"Bad dog! When I am in your presence you will look at and pay attention to me alone. For the next week I will be your master and you will think of me as such." the man said in a booming voice that shook Shawn a little. "Now let's see what they brought me this time," the man said to himself seemingly as he bent down to inspect the new dog. Shawn felt humiliated and exposed as the man slowly looked and felt over every single inch of Shawn's doggy body. What made it worse was that he wasn't saying a word. Finally the inspection reached Shawn's groin and Shawn gave a shutter as Master Asshole (as Shawn now thought of him since he didn't give a name) practically massaged his genitalia. "You're a flincher. I'll have to fix that." Master Asshole said as he put something in his mouth and blew. Didn't take Shawn but a millisecond to realize that the splitting headache and muscles tightening up were being caused by what must be a dog whistle of some sort. As soon as he stopped he once again reached for Shawn's doggy vagina and once again Shawn flinched causing MA to blow the whistle again. This happened four more times until finally Shawn managed to stand perfectly still while MA practically fondled him. "Good girl." MA said placing a small and stale dog treat in front of Shawn as a reward which Shawn ate begrudgingly.

Shawn was then led to an area of the indoor park that seemed to have a lake where there were 3 dogs playing with each other but all stopped as soon as MA made his presence known with another blow of his whistle. "Scotty! Lassie! Maxwell! Here!" At this command the small Scotty dog, a boarder collie, and a black lab all walked up to MA in what Shawn figured was close to being a doggy march. "This is Sasha, she will be your last companion. Now we are going to jog around this lake at different paces and you will stay at full attention the entire time. Now let's go!" Shawn was wondering how MA thought the dogs were going to understand the instructions but didn't have time to ponder it as MA took off with 4 leashes, including Shawn's, in his hand. After a choke endued start Shawn managed to catch up to the dogs who were running in front of MA in posed unison. If Shawn wasn't in the situation he was in he'd think that the look of four dogs running in a very pristine style almost perfectly step for step. However Shawn kept feeling tiny tugs at his leash along with instruction being shouted at him of "Run with the pack!"

For what Shawn suspected were miles of running Shawn slowly managed to find a rhythm of the dogs he was running with. Shawn wasn't sure if the negative tugging and yelling from MA were helping or hurting but Shawn knew that MA wasn't going to stop until Shawn got it right. Finally after hours of jogging at various speeds MA mercifully stopped the pack. "Attention!" MA yelled and all the dogs, including Shawn, turned and stood perfectly still, "I'm leaving for the day but I will be back tomorrow for your final work out. I certainly hope you are all shaped up by then." MA said sternly to his subordinates before he turned to leave.

As soon as the door shut and the 4 were left to themselves they all seemed to relax. The 3 natural dogs all went to a food area where there was some meaty food waiting for them. Shawn followed and for the first time Shawn finally got some time to look at his fellow show dogs. There was a tiny black and gray haired Scotty male dog so brilliantly named Scotty. A female medium sized brown and white female boarder collie once again with the totally original name of Lassie. And then there was a large black Labrador who was referred to as Maxwell. After gulping down some actually well made and tasty beef like food Shawn went back to the lake area to take a nap after the long afternoon of work.
1431322.title: He should have practiced

choices: Shawn panics and Maxwell overpowers him
14313221.content:
Shawn woke up a few hours later thanks to a wet sensation on his face. Fearing what was happening Shawn immediately woke up and rolled out of bed. It was then that he remembered that he was a dog in the grass and not himself in bed and he'd just rolled into the man made lake. Shawn walked out of the lake and shook himself as dry as he could when Lassie came up to him and gave him a little lick on the face, the same one that had woken him up. Shawn gave a bark that would have otherwise been a burst of laughter at himself for his blunder. Lassie ran off and Shawn got the feeling she wanted him to follow so he did. They ran to the other side of the gym where Scotty was walking around with a worn looking teddy bear in his jaw. Lassie then walked over and played a little game of tug of war with the bear that Lassie won and then with the bear in mouth walked over to Shawn. Shawn was a little grossed out by the obviously chewed up, dirty, and slobber covered bear and was about to refuse, but the (literal) puppy dog look in Scotty and Lassie's eyes made him reconsider, so with a cautious approach Shawn took the bear into his mouth and pulled it away from Lassie. Scotty then in turn took the bear from Shawn and he ran off making Lassie and Shawn chase him and so the pattern continued for a while.

Shawn couldn't believe how much fun he was having. It was just a very simple game. As simple as it gets. But he was having a blast passing the bear with his new canine companions. After a few rounds Shawn decided to try to get Maxwell in on the fun, no need for anyone to be left out. So on his next pass with the bear Shawn walked up to Maxwell who was sitting under a tree and offered him the bear. Maxwell noticed Shawn and sniffed the air and the bear but didn't seem to be interested in the bear at all. So deciding he'd try again later Shawn turned to walk back to Scotty and Lassie. However Shawn hadn't gone far before he felt something cold on his rear. Flinching and turning around Shawn was surprised to see that Maxwell had been sniffing him!

Not amused by Maxwell, Shawn went towards Lassie and Scotty at a faster trot, which Maxwell kept up with. He then went into a full on run, which Maxwell kept up with again. Finally after running as fast as his legs could manage Shawn was practically tackled from behind by Maxwell. His eyes widening Shawn very much realized what Maxwell was getting ready to do.
14313221.title: That evening the dogs want to play

choices: The next day is training with MA again
The next day is training with the movie stars
143132211.content:
Oh you want some of this! I'll show you some of this! Shawn thought angerly as Maxwell attempted to mount him. Thinking on his feet (or paws) Shawn made some internal shifting with his organs, particularly the ones near his hind end. It only took a few seconds to make his adjustments before Maxwell attempted his mount him, and just before Maxwell could, Shawn spewed out a skunk like spray from his rear coating Maxwell in a horrendously stinky substance. No longer in the mood, Maxwell yelped and wined and ran to the lake where he submerged himself and did not want to move. Shawn gave a strong doggy laugh at poor horny Maxwell and went back to Lassie and Scotty where they immediately resumed their pass the bear game as if nothing had happened.

A few hours later the game was finally dieing down. The three friends were now taking minutes in between passes and were walking instead of running as Shawn took the bear from Scotty. Deciding it was about time to get to bed for the night Shawn headed over to his spot by the lake, but on his way there stood an old foe. Maxwell, still reeking of skunk spray, walked cautiously up to Shawn. Shawn reshifted his insides back to the skunk spray in case Maxwell tried anything funny again. But instead of sniffing Shawn's ass and mounting him this time around, Maxwell sniffed Shawn's face and gave a friendly lick. Shawn was a little surprised by the nice gesture and loosened his grip on the bear just enough for Maxwell to rip it away. So once again the game was on, but this time with four instead of three. As sad as it is, attempted rape aside this has been the most fun I have ever had with any coworkers. Shawn thought just before he fell asleep by the lake.
143132211.title: Shawn stops Maxwell

1431322112.content:
Shawn woke up the next morning to the smell of roast chicken and brown gravy. Waking up Shawn was curious to see where the smell was coming a bowl that was set right in front of him.

"Oh, she's waking up. What do I do now?" An anxious female voice said a little shakily.

"You let her eat. But stay near her so she knows it was you who gave her the food. Let her know who is in charge."

Shawn recognized the second voice as Master Asshole but the first was familiar but he couldn't quite place from where. Looking up at the provider of warm chicken Shawn was surprised to see someone he knew. Well, knew of. It was the star of some quirky tv comedy about two hot sorority sisters who got into wacky antics on a weekly basis, Ally Larson. Ally was a 5'6" raven hair girl with nice C cup breasts and was currently wearing a skinny jeans and t-shirt combo that would be described as 'hipster like', but she wore it very well. "Why is she just looking at me like that?" Ally said to MA.

"It's because she can smell your fear. Be confident. This isn't something you can act your way out of."

Realizing that he's been just staring at Ally for a little too long, Shawn turned his attention to the bowl of food and gulped it down. Damn this is good. I'm eating better as a freaking poodle in a gym than I was as a man in my apartment. As he finished the last of bowl and went to the lake for a drink Shawn listened in on Ally and MA's conversation.

"Sir, I'm sorry. I'm not a dog person, I don't know if this is a good idea."

"Believe me it is. I've informed the director that the dogs are ahead of schedule with their training and she thinks that it's a good idea of the actors to spend some bonding time with their individual dog that they will be with on screen. The other 3 have already taken their dogs earlier."

"But I wouldn't know what to do with her."

"Her name is Sasha. And the two of you can do whatever you would like. You can take her to the park. Take her to the beach. Take her for a walk. Or just relax at your home. It doesn't matter so long as the two of you do it together. Now here's her leash, I'll be waiting outside to lock up the place."

"Okay." Ally said meekly. Turning around Shawn saw that Ally seemed a little nervous, so he helped her by giving a friendly bark and walking up to her. "Oh good girl." Ally said giving an awkwardly harsh pat on the head to Shawn. It's like the girl has never interacted with a dog before. Ally bent down to attach the leash to Shawn collar and lead Shawn outside to a waiting limo. Cool, never been in one of those before Shawn thought as the two got in and after Shawn took a minute to take in everything inside Ally told him their destination.
1431322112.title: A visit from the stars of the movie

14313221121.content:
"We're going to my house girl." Ally told Shawn while once again giving him another really awkward head pat. Sounds good to me. Thought Shawn as he continued to be fascinated by the insides of the limo. He really wished he had hands so that he could push all of the many different buttons, but still managed to find some level of contentment with standing in front of the air conditioner with his tongue hanging out.

After pulling up to Ally's palatial estate Shawn reluctantly left his seat of leather after feeling a more than gentle tug at his neck from Ally. "Come on girl. This is my home. Don't you want to see my home." Ally said with each tug. I'll be glad to come along if you let me walk instead of choking me, Shawn thought as he was practically pulled out of the limo. As soon as he was out, Shawn took a moment to look at the quite sizable home of Ally but only got a second to check it out as Ally went right back to dragging him through the front door. "Come along girl."

Ally led Shawn to the living room of the home where Ally sat down in a large and very fluffy looking chair, Shawn seeing that there was more than enough room for two hopped on up by her. Something Ally obviously wasn't expecting, "Oh my. Dog's shouldn't be on chairs I think. You aren't supposed to be up here," Ally said getting up and pulling Shawn off the chair. Is this girl for real? She has no idea how to handle a dog. How did she get this job? Shawn thought but as Ally pulled him down his snout went down her top, Ah, I see why.

As soon as she'd pulled Shawn off the chair Ally sat back down. "Now we'll watch some tv for a little while. You just look at the lights on the screen while I make a few phone calls." Shawn gave a doggy sigh as he lied down and watched the tv showing a dvr'd episode of Ally's show. Some day of bonding. Come tomorrow when we start shooting she's going to have no idea how to act and then she'll probably get fired. Can't say she won't deserve it, I mean who casts someone for a dog movie who doesn't know how to act around dogs. A few minutes later Shawn came to a new revelation, Crap. If anyone get's in trouble at the filming tomorrow it's going to be me not her, who blames the star? Rebecca and I need this paycheck, I have to do something.

So he did. Shawn got up and started looking around the house for something that might give him an idea on how he can do something to get Ally's attention. After some searching Shawn finally found something that he thought might work.
14313221121.title: Chilling at Ally's

143132211212.content:
Shawn had been looking around the house for something, anything, that might be able to help him make a connection of some sort with Ally. Shawn spent alot of time finding things like slippers, gloves, pillows, and just about anything he could reasonably find and tried to bring it to Ally but all he would get is a scolding about 'designer' this and 'name brand' that. I didn't think it was possible but our 'bond' has somehow gotten even worse. Fantastic. But Shawn couldn't give up, his job, Becca's reputation, and most importantly his paycheck was on the line. So Shawn made his way into a room full of open boxes that seemed to have been dug through. Figuring he might as well try looking in here Shawn tried to look through the boxes for something. What the hell am I doing. I don't even know what I'm looking for. Shawn thought after he used his paws to dig through the boxes as efficiently as he could. He would have tried to shift back to himself to look through the boxes more efficiently but didn't want to run the risk of getting caught. Finally getting ready to give up Shawn noticed something. One old box in particular had a very peculiar smell. That one really smells like Ally...and now I feel like a pervert. Shawn pushed that thought out of his head and dug through one last box to find the source and emerged with an old rag doll in his jaws.

Here goes nothing. Shawn thought as he once again offered Ally the offering of friendship. "What did you do this time doggy, ew what is that old..." Ally seemed to be frozen.

"Oh. My. God! Miss Little Ally! I thought I lost you years ago in the move. But how. Where did you find her girl!" Ally said to Shawn almost expecting an answer, so Shawn gave a bark in response, "Wow, this is amazing, it's like you're trying to talk to me. This is so cool. You are the greatest! Come on up here Sasha." Shawn noticed a huge change in tone and also noted it was the first time Ally had used his name, well, his dog name. So Shawn jumped up beside Ally in her chair and laid down in Ally's lap for a nice nap. Trying to form an emotional bond sure can be exhausting. Shawn thought as he fell asleep with Ally lightly scratched his head.
143132211212.title: Making a connection

1431322112122.content:
That week was by far the best week of Shawn's career. He didn't even care that he was a female dog the whole time. All he had to do was walk in a certain way and stand still on cue and he was getting paid a lot to do it. Shawn even started to make a little game of estimating how much he was making with each step on the set and was very very pleased with the math he was coming up with. And the money wasn't even the best part. Okay it was, but there were other perks of note. When he wasn't shooting he was encouraged by Ally and the big wigs on set to just play with the other dogs, something that while simple was quite fun. It was kind of like playing games when he was a little kid, only now he was on 4 legs and more importantly was on the clock. His relationship with Ally was also getting much better. It was weird but he was kind of developing a little bit of a crush on her, but that might have just been because she always gave him some high quality meat snacks to him on the set.

But all good things come to an end and the last day of shooting came. Rebecca had come by to pick him (and the paycheck) up from the cast party. He was glad to see his cousin again and was ready to get back to walking on two legs but on a level he did think he was going to miss this, heck he might have to pick up more animal work in the future if it looks like it will be as nice as this shoot. Shawn was about to just walk over to Rebecca but saw that Ally was talking to her and decided not to interrupt so he played one last game of tag with the dogs from the film. After a few minutes of play Rebecca came over and called out, "Sasha! Here girl." Hearing his stage name Shawn immediately trotted over to Rebecca who took him away from the group but didn't seem to be leaving yet, Becca bent down and talked to Shawn in a serious tone.

"That girl. Ally. The actress you've been working with." Shawn nodded showing he understood, "She just offered me $100,000 to buy you."

Shawn's jaw dropped, "My sentiments exactly." Becca said, "We can't really turn down that kind of money Shawn." Shawn shot his cousin a look. "Don't look at me like that. I would never sell you...well unless I knew you were a shapeshifter who could escape in a few days or weeks. And I do know that. Of course I won't do this unless you give the okay obviously and you'll get 75%." Shawn gave a little growl, "Okay 80%. All you have to do is be Ally's pet poodle for a few days or weeks. And then whenever you feel it's the right time you make your escape and we're 100 thousand dollars richer. What do you say?"

Shawn immediately wanted to say yes. The money would be fantastic and it might be cool to hang out with Ally for a few more weeks, he was really enjoying her company. But then again he'd have to be Sasha the poodle for an undetermined amount of time, and heck he pictured having to escape and the look on Ally's cute little face when he'd have to leave. That image alone almost made Shawn turn down the offer then and there. "What do you say Shawn, I need an answer now. Is it okay with you if I sell you to Ally?"
1431322112122.title: Post filming and Ally has an offer

choices: Being Ally's dog is actually kind of awesome
Being Ally's dog is a pain in the butt
14313221121221.content:
Shawn at first was against the idea of selling himself for money, somehow it seemed wrong, but upon hearing the $100,000 price tag Shawn didn't even give it a second thought as he nodded his poodle head furiously. Laughing at the reaction Rebecca said, "All right, I'll give Ally the good news. Now before I tell Ally I just want to lay down a foundation for a plan with you. Now Shawn we can't have you run away just a few days after the sale because then she might try to get her money back and she'd probably have a potential legal case so let's say you stay with her for a minimum of let's say a month. Does that sound reasonable to you?"

Shawn thought about it for a second but decided that for that kind of money he could deal with being a dog for a month. Besides, Ally had a nice big place, if he really need to feel human again he could find a room and be himself for short time periods. So once again Shawn nodded to his cousin. "Okay. So you'll stay with Ally for at least a month, but as a safety plan if you haven't escaped or I don't here from you for two full months I'll assume something has gone wrong and you're in trouble or you've forgotten yourself. Just for that precaution I won't spend the $100,000 just in case I'm forced to buy you back. Now Shawn, please don't make me do that. Understand?" Again Shawn nods. "Good boy, erm girl."

With that Rebecca took Shawn's leash and led him over to Ally where she excitedly wrote out a check and took the leash.

"Oh Sasha I'm so glad you're mine now! We're going to be best friends forever. I love you so much." Ally said bending down and giving Shawn an almost rib crunching hug which while uncomfortable did give Shawn a very good look at Ally's cleavage making the pain very bearable. Still in the surprisingly strong bear hug Shawn looked to his cousin who had a slightly worried look on her face. Shawn gave her a wink to alleviate her worries as Ally released the hug and lead Shawn back to her limo.

How bad could being Ally's dog be? Shawn thought to himself as Ally scratched behind his ear.
14313221121221.title: Shawn sells himself

choices: Ally has to go start filming for a new movie
Ally wants to take 'Sasha' on a road trip
143132211212212.content:
For a week Shawn was in a lower level of heaven.

Every day Shawn would wake up cuddled up next to the beautiful Ally who couldn't bare to even sleep without her precious Sasha. He was fed 3 square meals a day which usually consisted of sausage in the morning, chicken in the afternoon, and steak in the evening. Ally would spend about an hour a day playing simply yet surprisingly fun games with him. And when he wasn't eating or playing he was either taking a nap at his leisure or laying down on Ally's lap watching television. He even got some 'Shawn time' when Ally would go out to do some shopping or excessive. Overall life was nearly perfect and Shawn actually got a little sad about the idea of leaving this piece of paradise he'd carved out for himself.

And then the friends came and ruined everything.

A week into Shawn's living with Ally, a bunch of young woman, most of whom Shawn recognized from a variety of tv shows and gossip magazines, came to visit Ally. Ally excitingly showed her friends her new best friend aka 'Sasha'. Shawn proceeded to 'strut his stuff' in front of them expecting the usual praise and gasps of awe he usually got. Instead Ally's girlfriends were disgusted. "This dog is just not cute enough for you. I mean look at her, she's all muscle. She should be much cuter than that," one of the friends said. Shawn had to admit he was a bit hurt by this and looked to Ally to stand up for him but instead Ally simply said, "I guess I know what you mean, but isn't that just who she is? I mean we can't change that can we?"

No you most certainly can not. Shawn thought and even gave a bark at the friends in disapproval. Unfortunately they didn't feel the same.

Thus began the decent into hell.

Gone were the sleeping arrangements where he cuddled with Ally at night. "That won't do. You'll just end up with dog hair on your sheets and pajamas." So you started to sleep on an overly fluffy pillow, that never would feel as good as the sleeping with a beautiful woman.
Gone were the luxurious meats Shawn had received for every meal and enter a barrage of soy and tofu based meat like alternative that tasted like crap and made Shawn feel ill all the time.
Shawn even lost his alone time where he could just be Shawn. Instead Ally decided with some encouraging from her friends, to buy a deluxe security system with camera's all over the house making it nearly impossible for Shawn to shift unless he risked getting caught on tape.
On top of that, Ally now insisted on taking Shawn with her wherever she went. If she went to the mall, Shawn had to be there. If she went exercising at the gym Shawn had to be there. Even when she went out to eat Shawn had to be there. Shawn thought that there must be some kind of laws again dogs in public places like this but it seemed that if you had the money those laws didn't matter as much, and Ally sure had the money. And if that wasn't bad enough, Ally insisted that if Shawn was going out in public then she would have to dress her 'Sasha' for the occasions. Which meant every single day Shawn was forced into ridiculous looking sweaters, hats, and even skirts and shoes designed just for dogs. Shawn tried to protest these at first but Ally was persistent and even threatened to withhold food and play time if Shawn didn't cooperate, so cooperate Shawn reluctantly did.

It didn't even seem too bad, he was even trying to get a laugh out of the whole thing until he saw a video of Ally walking him on some tabloid tv show. If Ally wasn't there he'd have shifted into a mouse and just hidden away under a couch until the humiliation went away. Shawn could even swear he could here Rebecca laughing at him half way across town.

After about a month of this form of torture Shawn decided, I've got to get out of here as soon as possible. Luckily an opportunity would soon arise.
143132211212212.title: Being Ally's dog is a pain in the butt

choices: Shawn wakes up on a cruise ship with Ally
Shawn wakes up in a Hollywood kennel
1431322112122121.content:
"Are you sure? Okay, I'll get everything together. Bye bye." Shawn hear Ally say into her cell phone to what Shawn assumed was her agent. She'd been on the phone with that guy constantly for the last few days. At first Shawn was interested in the Hollywood insider stuff about what the movie could be and who was involved and what it'd be about and stuff, but as the days droned on and Shawn's food kept him feeling malnourished Shawn just stopped caring about the details and just wanted her out of the house so he could escape and get back to his home.

"I'm sorry Sasha baby, but I've got to get packing. I have to head out tomorrow to go start my next movie. It'll be great, it's on a cruise ship and I get to spend a month out there on the open waters all expenses paid. Doesn't that sound great? Now there there, don't look at me with those eyes." Ally said obviously reading Shawn's exhaustion for sadness at her leaving, "Don't worry, I'll make sure you are taken care of, I've got a special plan for you."

Fantastic. Shawn sarcastically thought to himself, but he managed to give a half hearted yip to Ally.

"That a girl." Ally said rubbing Shawn's head, "Now wait here, I've got a very very special treat for you."

Shawn just lied back down on the kitchen floor, Probably more grainy soy surprise. Shawn thought, but quickly his head popped up as his nose sensed something it long sorely missed.

"How would you like a very special steak made just for you."

Yes please! Shawn barked excited that he could finally taste real food for the first time in weeks. In less than a minute Shawn had gulped the whole thing down. But something seemed a bit...off.

"Come here girl, I need you over here." Shawn heard Ally say, but it was weird, as if through some sort of filter. "Come inside girl. I don't need you passing out on the floor. It'll make it hard for me to transport you."

Transport? What? Shawn thought before realizing all to late that Ally was leading him into a traveling cage. No no no! That's it, I've got to get out of here now! Shawn tried to make a break for the door but his legs gave out on him after the first step.

"Oh no! The sleeping pills have already taken affect. Guess we're doing this the hard way." Ally said as she pull and pushed Shawn limp and numb body into the cage.

Where the hell is she taking me? Was Shawn's last thought before giving into the sleeping pills in the steak.
1431322112122121.title: Ally has to go start filming for a new movie

choices: Barbie takes Shawn (Sasha) for a walk.
Shawn is put into a room with the stud dog.
14313221121221212.content:
After what feels like a very restful sleep, Shawn opens his eyes to find himself locked in a crate. "Oh great", thought Shawn. "I'm in a kennel while Ally does her next picture. I'm starting to regret this quite a bit."

"Oh, good! You're awake girl!", said a very beautiful women. "Looks like you'll be staying with us for a little while. We're going to have lots of fun together. My name is Barbie and you must be Sasha."

Shawn couldn't help but stare at Barbie. She was incredibly hot and had a body to die for. At least if he was stuck in a kennel he had some eye candy to look at.

"Once you're feeling up to it Sweetie, I'll introduce you to your new mate. Your owner wants to breed you that that fine stud over there. I imagine she will get a lot of money for your pups when they come." said Barbie in a very bubbly voice.

"Oh no!", thought Shawn. "How the hell am I going to get out of this one?", as he looked at the confinements of the room. There were cameras everywhere and no place to hide. He would probably be forced to mate with his new friend and there was no way, that he could think of, to get out of it without outright changing in front of someone.
14313221121221212.title: Shawn wakes up in a Hollywood kennel

choices: Shawn forget's subtlty and uses his powers to get away
143132211212212121.content:
As he circled his caged area over and over again hoping against hope that he would find some sort of hidden escape hatch so that he could get out of there without having to shift in front of the cameras. But with each passing minute Shawn came to the realization that he would probably be stuck with the stud dog that was just a few jail cells over. Shawn knew because he could hear and smell him and he was certain by the tone of the barks and the unmistakable smell of musk that the stud could sense him. Shawn knew that with the camera's and people around he wouldn't be able to pull the skunk spray maneuver he'd pulled just a few weeks ago during the movie. He sure as hell would not let himself get pregnant, he'd already given himself a shapeshifting spading the second Barbie had mentioned the stud. However even with that done he'd still get stuck with the stud for multiple 'sessions' while he was still stuck there and Shawn was not going to let that happen. Shawn was starting to get desperate, he was strongly considering just turning into an elephant and taking down the building, screw secrecy, he was not going to let that stud dog have his way with him.

But after taking a deep breath, Shawn started to calm down. He's a kinda smart guy with shapeshifting powers. Surely he can escape with a more...subtle approach. After a few minutes Barbie came to Shawn's cage with a leash in hand, Shawn panicked thinking he'd run out of time before his time with the stud dog, but felt a rush of ecstasy when Barbie said, "All right Sasha, I'm going to take you for walkees before I put you in the 'love cage'. Once around the building should be enough."

Barbie attached the leash to Shawn through the cage so he couldn't dart away so easily and opened the door. Shawn realized it was now or never. Shawn quivered as Barbie walked him pasted a large black stud poodle. It may have been a poodle but the stud sure scared the hell out of Shawn more than any dog ever could. As Barbie opened the door to the hallway Shawn knew he had to make his move.
143132211212212121.title: Barbie takes Shawn (Sasha) for a walk.

choices: Try to avoid the male stud as long as you can.
1431322112122121211.content:
Shawn had to make a choice quick, so he just ran for it. He couldn't take the chance that his powers would be caught on video, so he went for the most simple solution, RUN!

Shawn bolted before Barbie had a chance to react and took off down the hall. Finally he could go back to his human form, all he had to do was make it outside. Far behind him, he heard Barbie calling out for help as he deftly rounded the corner to the outside door. That's when he noticed that his plan was going to fail. Two large men with looped sticks sat waiting for him at a closed door. Damn, he should have thought of this. He was cornered with no way out. As he sat there, weighing his options, he heard Barbie coming up behind him. "Easy there girl!", she said between pants. She came up to Shawn and attached the collar, patting him on the head. "You've got a lot of energy! I think we'll hold off on the walk for right now. Don't worry though, you can still run. We'll let you run in the courtyard for a bit. I don't think I could keep up with you Sasha.", she said smiling and leading Shawn back through the hallway.

"Maybe the courtyard doesn't have cameras.", thought Shawn. "I should have received a much larger cut from this agreement. I'm certainly going to have some words for Rebecca once this is behind me."

Shawn was led out into a courtyard, about 50 by 50 feet. Once they were behind the gate, Barbie released Shawn and carefully backed out of the gate before latching it. "Have fun girl!", she said with a knowing smile.

Shawn took stock of his surroundings. "Well, there goes any idea of escaping using my powers", as he looked toward the monitor on the fence. The fence was extremely secure, so there was no getting out by force. "Maybe I'll have one more shot when Barbie comes to get me. I have to think of something." As he was pacing the cage, he heard the gate open. It was Barbie holding the stud on a leash. "I'll give you two some privacy.", said Barbie after she unhooked the stud poodle and left, closing the gate behind her.
1431322112122121211.title: Shawn simply runs away

choices: Shawn enjoys his time with his mate and decides its a great way to pass the time
14313221121221212112.content:
Shawn was determined to stay away from the large male dog and did his best to keep his distance. Although the male made multiple attempts to mount Shawn, he was unsuccessful each time. Shawn was now confident that he could avoid being bred to the stud dog. His perseverance began to wear on the horny male as he started losing interest.

A few days passed without incident. Shawn wondered how long he would be confined to this area with the male dog when he heard the gate open and saw Barbie with another staff member.

"They don't seem to be getting along. I'm not sure what it wrong.", said Barbie with a concerned look on her face. "They both seem to be in perfect health. If this keeps up, we'll have to give artificial insemination a try."

"Artificial WHAT!?", thought Shawn as he turned toward Barbie.

"Hey there Sasha! I hope everything is alright.", as she patted Shawn on the head and said what a good girl she was.

Panic set in as Shawn wondered what would happen if he DID become pregnant. He didn't see any way out of this, but had to buy some time. He watched Barbie leave and whined as she walked away.

"Don't worry girl, I'll be back to check on you a bit later.", she said as her and the other staff member continued there conversation inside the building.

Shawn wrestled with the idea for the next hour. "How bad could it be?", he thought. After all, I'm the only one who will know.", he thought as he looked at the stud dog lapping up water from his dish in the corner of the cage. "If I don't do this, things could get much worse.", he thought as he accepted what he must do.

Although Shawn decided to finally submit to the male dog, he had another problem. He had spent so much time rejecting him, that he was no longer interested. Shawn would need to not only submit, but he would have to encourage it. "Maybe if I was in heat?", was his last thought before he concentrated on a minor change to his form.

Shawn felt a pleasant and warming tingling sensation in his flanks as he stared at the stud. The stud was enticed by the smells that Sasha was releasing and came over and began sniffing the bitch's rear.

"I can't do this!", thought Shawn, right before the stud jumped up on his back and mounted his bitch. "Oh my GOD!", thought Shawn as a wave of euphoria washed over him. It had been so long since he had any kind of sexual stimulation and he was certainly enjoying the sensations from mating. Before he knew it, he was rocking to the rhythm of the male trying to push him deeper. Wave and waves of ecstasy hit him like a ton of bricks. He was so lost in the moment, he hadn't even noticed that Barbie had entered through the gate. He was finally rocked with a major orgasm and howled deeply. It was only after his final orgasm had faded that he noticed that Barbie was looking at him standing there with the male dog knotted up inside his body.

"Good girl Sasha! I knew Romeo there would finally win you over.", she said as she winked.

"Yes.", he thought. "I guess I am a good girl." If dogs could blush, Shawn would have been the deepest shade of red.
14313221121221212112.title: Try to avoid the male stud as long as you can.

choices: The changes stop with Shawn's head. His body is resisting.
143132211212212121122.content:
Seeing no way out of this situation, Shawn submitted to the stud dog frequently over the next few days. Although he desperately wanted to get back to his own body, he was starting to enjoy it just a bit.

This continued for most of the week until the day Barbie came to get him. "Hey there girl!", she said as she clipped the leash to his collar. "Looks like you are leaving today. You have a surprise visitor! I'm sorry to say that Romeo won't be coming with you though."

"Finally!", thought Shawn. He couldn't wait to get back to his old body and leave this embarrassing situation behind him. He looked at Barbie and happily wagged his tail. "Maybe I'll look her up when I'm a man again. I'd certainly like to get to know her.", he thought as he pictured her naked.

Barbie brought Shawn into the waiting room where he saw Rebecca sitting in a comfortable chair. "What the hell is going on!?", thought Shawn. Rebecca was the last person he expected to see.

Rebecca rose and approached Shawn. "Hey there Sasha! I'm here to take you home. I missed you so much that I talked Ally into selling you back.", she said as she patted Shawn's head. "We'll talk in the car.", she whispered in Shawn's ear.

Barbie dropped to one knee and embraced Shawn. "I'm going to miss having you around Sasha!", she said sadly. "I hope you'll come back to visit us. Rebecca told us she would bring back you're puppies once you've had them. I'm sure they will be adorable just like you!"

"Puppies!? That's not possible, is it?", thought Shawn. "The changes I made to my body should have prevented that." The image of him mating and the wonderful sensations that it caused popped back into his head. Doubt suddenly took hold of him.

"Let's go Sasha! We'll stop by the park on the way out. Thank you for taking such good care of her, Barbie!", said Rebecca as she headed to the door.

There were too many people around to continue the conversation with Shawn. "Just wait until we get to the car.", she urged. After a short walk, Rebecca opened the door to let Shawn in and hopped into the driver's seat, shutting the door.

Shawn started barking in annoyance.

"Calm down Shawn! You were gone so long that I began to worry that you were stuck. Ally only agreed to give you back if she could have first pick of your litter. We can figure out how we deal with this together, but first thing's first. Let's get back to my place so you can change back.", said Rebecca as she pulled out into the road.

"Oh, what's a few more minutes.", thought Shawn. He was actually starting to get a little nervous about changing back and tried not to think about it.

The drive wasn't a short one, but after an hour, they were back safe at Rebecca's house. Shawn ran as fast as he could to the door and impatiently jumped up and down at the door while Rebecca fumbled with her keys.

Once inside, Shawn ran into the bedroom for a little privacy while Rebecca went out to grab the mail.
143132211212212121122.title: Pregnant!?

choices: 2 Weeks Later and Shawn and Becca are adjusting
2 Weeks Later and things aren't going well
1431322112122121211222.content:
As soon as he was alone Shawn excitedly started to change back to himself. But nothing happened. Shawn was terrified that the pregnancy was going to prevent him from swapping or worse, he'd forgotten how to shift completely. Panic starting to set in Shawn closed his eyes and concentrated harder than he ever had before on a shift and much to his relief he could feel his face taking it's normal form and he could feel his paws turning into hands and feet. But that was all. Shawn tried and tried and tried, but he couldn't change anything else besides his head, hands, and feet. Shawn looked back at his dog body, and specifically his belly area and knew that he must not be able to do anything to endanger what was in him. "Fuck!" Shawn barked out saying his first word in over a month. Rebecca sprinted into the room to see what was wrong and when she saw her half dog/half cousin she let out a scream and fainted to the ground. Shawn got to his feet to go check on her, but found that with his still doggy legs he was only able to take a few steps before he lost his balance and landed on all fours. Frustrated yet more concerned than anything Shawn 'walked' over to Rebecca and woke her up. When she opened her eyes and saw Shawn she began to scream but Shawn covered her mouth. "Calm down, we don't want to attract any attention, especially with me stuck like this."

So Shawn explained to Rebecca that he assumed he'd be unable to fully be himself again until he gave birth to the litter. Shawn purposely left out the details of the breeding and simply told her he'd been knocked out and artificially impregnated and thankfully Rebecca didn't ask for details. "So I guess I'm stuck like this until I give birth. Atleast I can talk and use my hands...kind of. How long is a dog gestation period?"

Rebecca seemed to have calmed down enough to answer softly, "About two months."

Shawn groaned, "Well, it could be worse." Needing a change of subject Shawn trotted over to the couch and grabbed the remote, "So, I miss any good tv?"
1431322112122121211222.title: Shawn's body resists the change

14313221121221212112221.content:
For the next few days, Shawn and Rebecca started a routine. Shawn would stay at Rebecca’s apartment during the days and watch TV. Everything seemed normal until Shawn started getting terrible stomach aches. After spending most of the days with his human upper body, Shawn was eating normal human food. But he soon found out that his lower half dog body couldn’t handle the human food. After realizing he had to eat dog food, Shawn would shape shift completely into Sasha to eat. He tried eating dog food with a spoon, but couldn’t handle the taste with his human taste buds.

Shawn also found that it was nearly impossible to hold his body on top of the toilet. Rebecca was fed up with cleaning up Shawn’s messes and insisted on taking him downstairs for walks. Shawn would have to morph into his complete ‘Sasha’ body for their walks.

Except for being leashed, Shawn didn’t mind the walks. It was a chance for him to get out of Rebecca’s apartment. Shawn enjoyed the fresh air. It wasn’t until after a week of being walked, that the landlord approached Rebecca. The landlord had heard many complaints of the new dog in the building who wasn’t registered. After almost getting evicted, Rebecca was able to pay the monthly pet deposit and was able to keep her apartment. The following day, a new collar arrived in the mail.

Rebecca pulled the new collar out of the box and giggled, “I guess girl dogs get pink!” Shawn eyed the pink collar and rolled his eyes. Rebecca explained, “All the rest of the dogs in the building have to wear this collar on walks.” Rebecca winked, “Don’t worry, I wont make you wear it around the apartment!”

Shawn morphed completely into ‘Sasha’ and let Rebecca put the pink collar on him. They went for their normal afternoon walk. However, when Shawn tried to walk towards the normal tree behind the apartment building, he felt a shock. “What the…???” Shawn thought as he yelped in pain. Rebecca pulled the leash back and bent down to Shawn’s level, “I forgot to tell you about the shock collar. The landlord said it wouldn’t take you long to figure out where you can and cant go!”

“A shock collar?” Shawn thought to himself. It was bad enough he had to pretend to be a dog, but wearing a shock collar made the experience even more demeaning. For the next 20 minutes, Shawn nervously walked around the apartment building getting shocked and figuring out where dogs could go. Once they were back in the apartment, Rebecca unhooked the leash. Normally, Shawn immediately morphed back into his human upper half. Shawn just stared at Rebecca for a moment. Rebecca giggled, “I’m sorry about the collar! But it’s apartment policy. You are going to have to get used to it!” Rebecca waited a few moments and said, “Come on Shawn! Shapeshift your upper body so we can talk about this!”

Rebecca waited a few moments and Shawn refused to shape shift. Rebecca finally replied, “Fine! Stay as Sasha! I don’t care. I’m going shopping so I will be back in a few hours! Maybe then we can talk about this!“ Shawn still didn’t budge. Rebecca then grabbed the box the collar came in and found the handheld shocker. She said, “Come on Shawn! Don’t make me use this!”

Shawn still didn’t budge. Rebecca pressed the button and saw Shawn yelp from the shock. Rebecca said, “come on! Shapeshift so we can talk! Don’t make me shock you again!”


Shawn just hung his head as Rebecca pressed the button again. Rebecca saw Shawn flinch from the shock and laughed, “Ugh! You can be so stubborn!“ Rebecca then yelled, “Bad girl!“ and swatted Sasha’s butt. Rebecca pressed the shock button once more. Rebecca couldn’t believe Shawn wouldn’t shape shift. Rebecca then left.

2 hours later, Rebecca returned to the apartment. After shopping, she blew off the steam from earlier. Rebecca was surprised to see Shawn was still in his ‘Sasha’ form. Rebecca giggled, “Are you still mad about the collar? I’m surprised you didn’t shape shift so you can use the remote control? I know how much you like watching TV?”

Rebecca then jokingly grabbed the shock collar remote and said, “Don’t make me use this again! Come on girl! Shapeshift so we can talk about this!!“

Rebecca watched Shawn paw at his collar. Rebecca could tell something was wrong as she bent down and took his collar off. Almost immediately, Shawn shape shifted to have his human upper body. Shawn looked surprised, “I can’t shape shift with that collar on! There must be some magnetic field that interrupts my powers!

Rebecca was apologetic, “I’m sorry Shawn! I didn’t know!”

Shawn rolled his eyes, “I cant believe you shocked me!!”

Rebecca felt bad, “I just thought you were pouting for having to wear that collar. I didn’t know it prevented your powers? I was just trying to get you to shape shift.”

Shawn was mad, “And you swatted me too? Like I’m a real dog? What the hell was that?“

Rebecca was embarrassed, “I said I was sorry. I was just caught in the moment. You were acting like a stubborn dog, so I treated you like one. I didn’t know that collar prevented you from shapeshifting!“

Shawn sighed, “Whatever. But for some reason, I can’t shape shift while wearing that stupid collar.”

Rebecca grabbed the shock collar remote and giggled, “Well at least I know how to keep you from acting up when you are 100 percent Sasha!“

Shawn glared at Rebecca, “Very funny! You have no idea how much that shock hurts!“

Rebecca set the remote down and giggled again, “Just be a good girl and I wont have to use that thing!”

Shawn rolled his eyes, “Unfortunately, I really have to pee. So I need you to take me downstairs quick and we will finish this conversation later!” Shawn shape shifted back into Sasha as Rebecca put the shock collar back on. With a grin, Rebecca put the shock collar remote in her pocket and said, “I better take this along just in case…” Shawn shook his head as they headed downstairs.
14313221121221212112221.title: 2 Weeks Later and Shawn and Becca are adjusting

143132211212212121122211.content:
Rebecca came home after work and stood at the apartment door. “Shawn? I’m home! Are you ready to go downstairs?“ Rebecca was surprised Shawn didn’t run up to greet her. Rebecca was gone for almost 8 hours and knew Shawn would need to pee. Rebecca grabbed the leash by the door and yelled again “Shawn? Where are you? And why didn’t you return any of my texts?”

Rebecca started walking around her apartment looking for Shawn. Rebecca noticed the bathroom door was shut and could hear a pawing sound coming from inside of the bathroom. Rebecca opened the door and saw Sasha looking at her growling. Rebecca noticed Sasha was still wearing the pink shock collar and said, “OMG! I’m so stupid! Did I forget to take that off of you again?“

Sasha growled as Rebecca bent down to take it off. Sasha’s upper body immediately shape shifted back to Shawn’s upper body. Shawn was furious, “That was twice this week! Is it THAT hard to remember to take off this shock collar after my morning walk? You know my shape shifting powers don’t work while I’m wearing this collar!”

Rebecca giggled, “I guess this explains why you didn’t return any of my texts today.”

Shawn rolled his eyes at Rebecca’s joke.

Rebecca could sense Shawn’s anger and explained, “I’m sorry. I was in a hurry this morning. As we came in from your morning walk, I answered my phone. I got distracted and forgot to take your collar off.“

Shawn added, “Trust me, I noticed how distracted you were! You didn’t even realize I followed you into the bathroom.” Shawn let out a laugh, “By the way: Who flushes the toilet while they are on a business call?”

Rebecca interrupted, “I muted my cell phone. Don’t worry, they couldn’t hear anything.”

Shawn continued, “Whatever. But after you were done, you shut the door leaving me stuck in here all day! Without arms, I couldn’t reach the door!”

Rebecca replied, “OMG, I’m so sorry Shawn. It’s just habit to shut the door afterwards.“ Rebecca thought for a moment and said, “That explains why you were barking so loud as I left. I totally spaced out that you were still 100 percent Sasha.” Rebecca then got embarrassed, “Wait a second! Yuck! That means you watched me pee this morning?”

Shawn joked, “Big deal! Have you forgotten that I’ve actually BEEN you before?”

Rebecca laughed, “Oh yea. That’s right. I hate that when you shape shift into me!” Rebecca continued, “Anyways…I’m sorry about leaving you hanging today but I promise my news will make up for it!”

Shawn asked, “What news?“

With a smile, Rebecca said, “Since you didn’t read any of my texts, you have no idea that I booked you another role!”

Shawn listened eagerly. Knowing he couldn’t change back to his normal body until he delivered the puppies, Shawn was glad Rebecca figured out a way to make some extra cash. He knew the gig was for a dog and asked, “Let me guess, another dog food ad?”

Rebecca shook her head, “No. Nothing like that. This gig will actually earn you much more money. When you give birth to your litter, it is going to be filmed! I found an animal show looking to make a documentary. They are going to pay 5 thousand dollars!”

Shawn was surprised, “Wow! 5 thousand bucks is amazing!”

Rebecca pointed out, “You are going to have to give me a slightly larger agent cut this time though. You owe me 500 dollars for the pet deposit and another 150 for the shock collar. Not to mention all this dog food you have been going through that I‘ve been buying. I figure we will split this gig 50-50 this time to make up for the extra expenses.“

Shawn knew he owed Rebecca for letting him stay with her. Shawn laughed back, “Cool. So 2500 bucks to let them film? Sounds like an easy gig! It shouldn’t take more than 20 or 30 minutes right?“

Rebecca shook her head, “Seriously Shawn? 20 minutes? I cant believe you haven’t researched anything yet? You are going to give birth as a dog in a few weeks and you haven’t even looked into how it works? “ Rebecca rolled her eyes, “You need to really start learning what you are supposed to do. It’s going to take a few hours at a minimum to get all those puppies out of you!“

Shawn rubbed his belly with a gulp, “Hours? I just figured I would push these two puppies out in a few minutes! What takes so long?”

Rebecca rolled her eyes again, “Two puppies? I can’t believe how ignorant you are! You have a minimum of 6 in there! You could have up to 10!”

Shawn’s eyes got wider as he answered, “Holy crap! I didn’t realize how many were in here!” Shawn rubbed his belly again and giggled, “That explains all this extra weight I have been putting on!”

Rebecca laughed, “You only have a few weeks to research this! You need to really perform for the camera too! Afterwards, you need to lick them all clean, and let them feed off you! You need to get on the internet and get this stuff down!”

Shawn quickly joked, “Well if SOMEBODY wouldn’t forget to take off my collar so I could shape shift, maybe I could actually do something productive during the day!”

Rebecca answered, “I told you I was sorry about that. It wont happen again. But I’m serious about doing your research. We don’t get paid until after the documentary is filmed. You need to make it look as natural and normal as possible!”

Shawn agreed and added, “Gross. I can’t believe I have to lick them.“ Shawn then got a feeling and said, “Uh oh! I better shape shift back to 100 percent Sasha! I really need to pee after being stuck in here all day!” Moments later, Shawn shape shifted and Rebecca put the shock collar back on. They quickly made their way downstairs so Sasha could pee.
143132211212212121122211.title: A few days later

1431322112122121211222111.content:
During the following week, Shawn was shocked to learn about giving birth as a dog. He originally thought it would be a piece of cake. But he found out there were many ‘instincts’ that dogs were born with and know exactly what to do during birth.

Rebecca came home and Shawn met her at the door, “You have to get me some meds! Apparently dog’s hide their pain and I looked at some videos online and it looked like it really hurt!“

Rebecca laughed at the procrastination of Shawn. She assumed Shawn knew what he was getting into. Seeing Shawn starting to freak out about the whole situation was secretly rewarding for Rebecca. Shawn had the gift of shape shifting and has abused it his entire life. For once, Shawn would have to deal with the consequences of something real in his life. Even if that reality was giving birth as a dog.

Rebecca nodded, “You have a veterinary appointment tomorrow. I will talk to the veterinarian and see what we can get.“

Shawn remembered they had scheduled a veterinary appointment. It was something he was dreading because that meant spending most of the day as 100 percent Sasha. It was comforting knowing a professional would be checking him out though.

Rebecca grabbed the leash by the door and said, “Go ahead and shape shift so I can take you on a walk. The producer of the documentary will be here soon to start setting up for next week!”

Shawn complied and shape shifted his upper body back into Sasha. After his walk and getting back to the apartment, Rebecca didn’t take off his collar. Shawn looked up and pawed at his neck to remind Rebecca to take it off. Rebecca bent down to pet him, “The producer will be here any minute. It will be easier if you just stay like this until the meeting is over. He is going to take a survey of my apartment and see where to set up cameras.”

Shawn let out a growl letting Rebecca know he wasn’t happy about staying 100 percent Sasha. Rebecca jokingly grabbed the shock collar remote and said, “Bad girl! You keep growling at me like that and I’m going to have to use this!“

Shawn’s ears perked up at the threat. As Rebecca set the remote down she giggled, “I love the power of this thing!“

Shawn shook his head and jumped up on the couch in front of the TV. Rebecca picked the shock collar remote back up and pointed it at Shawn, “Down girl!“ Rebecca yelled. “You know I hate it when you sit on the furniture! You shed everywhere! I just vacuumed for the producer and I want this place to look nice!“

Shawn just stared at Rebecca and did his best to roll his eyes. Rebecca was irritated that Shawn didn’t listen and grabbed the remote, “Come on girl! Get down! Don’t make me use this!“

Shawn didn’t budge and Rebecca said, “Fine! Have it your way!“ Rebecca quickly hit the button. Shawn yelped at the shock and jumped down from the couch. Shawn looked up at Rebecca with a glare. Rebecca set the remote down giggling, “I’m sorry girl. But you have to get used to listening to me while we are being recorded! Ok?”

Shawn shook his head and curled up on the floor.
1431322112122121211222111.title: Shawn reseaches his pregnancy role

14313221121221212112221111.content:
The producer finally arrived and rang the doorbell. Rebecca whispered to Shawn, “Bark! Normal dogs bark when the doorbell rings!“

Shawn stood up on all 4’s and obeyed the request. He started barking and ran to the door. The producer came in and bent down, “Hi Sasha! It’s nice to finally meet you girl!“

Shawn did his best to act like a normal dog and continued to bark and sniff the producer. Finally the producer pulled a treat out of his pocket and said, “Don’t worry girl! We will get to know each other pretty well over the next few weeks!“ Shawn took the treat from the producer and ran away.

The producer and a team of 2 workers carrying supplies. Rebecca asked, “Wow? So what is all of this for?”

The producer began pointing out items as the workers unloaded. He explained, “We are going to replace Sasha’s normal kennel with this upgraded model. It has built in cameras to capture everything on camera leading up to the birth. Because she could pop at any time during the next week, we need to start recording her reactions.”

Rebecca watched as the workers disassembled Sasha’s kennel. The kennel was really only there for looks. It was only used if Rebecca needed to transport Shawn in the car. Normally, Shawn slept in the guest bedroom. He had never actually spent a second in the kennel at Rebecca’s apartment. Rebecca tried to explain, “A Kennel? Normally Sasha sleeps…uhhh…(She lied)...in my bed. Is the kennel really necessary?”

The producer explained, “This must be your first experience with a pregnant dog! Once the labor starts, Sasha is going to get very protective and want to be in a safe area. It would be best for you and her if you started kenneling her when you weren’t home. That way, Sasha will feel safe in her environment.”

Rebecca tried to fight the issue, “But she really doesn’t like being in a kennel…”

The producer interrupted, “Rebecca. You signed the contract for this documentary. We spent nearly 10 thousand dollars on all the equipment in this kennel. You will have to use it so we can catch as much as possible on film!”

Rebecca finally agreed with the producer. She didn’t want a small detail like this to ruin the gig. She knew Shawn wouldn’t be happy about being kenneled while she was at work. Next, the producer pulled out a tiny camera and said, “This one here is the money maker! It’s a head cam Sasha will wear to capture her point of view during the process!” The producer called Sasha, “Come here girl!”

Shawn came running up and got another treat from the producer. The producer pet his back and talked in a baby voice, “Don’t worry Sasha. This wont hurt if you stay still. Be a good doggy ok?”

Shawn was curious on what the producer was doing. The producer held the tiny ‘collar cam’ up to Shawn’s neck and smiled, “Stay still Sasha. This will only take a moment!” Another worker grabbed a solder iron and held it up to Shawn’s neck. Shawn could feel the heat and stayed completely still. Seconds later, the producer let go and smiled, “There we go! The cam is now soldered to her collar!”

Shawn ran away to the guest bedroom to examined what happened. He was surprised to see a tiny camera was now mounted to his shock collar.

In the other room, the producer explained to Rebecca, “We will start taking some test recordings from our remote studio in a few days. That way we can make sure the positioning is correct. We will go to 24 hours a day recording starting sometime next week. We don’t want to risk missing anything from Sasha’s point of view!”

Rebercca asked, “Hmm…So starting next week, everything here will be on recording? What about my voice in the background? What if I call somebody? Will it record everything I say too?”

The producer shook his head and explained, “You don’t have to worry about that! There is no audio on the collar cam. That way you can still have your privacy. It only turns on for a few minutes if there is any movement of Sasha’s head. However, I would recommend not walking around naked in Sasha’s point of view if you don’t want our crew to see anything inappropriate…”

Rebecca giggled, “Thanks for the warning!”

Rebecca and the producer talked for a few more minutes and he left. Rebecca realized she had an opportunity to finally have some peace and quiet around the house. Only Rebecca knew that the recording wouldn’t start until next week. She found Shawn in the bedroom laying on the bed and took off his shock collar. Immediately Shawn shape shifted his upper body back to human form. Shawn complained, “You didn’t say anything about a collar cam? Am I going to be able to shape shift with that thing always recording? And what the hell is that Kennel all about?”
14313221121221212112221111.title: The producer arrives

143132211212212121122211111.content:
Rebecca grinned to herself inside. She knew the test recordings wouldn’t start for a few days. Even more, the cameras wouldn’t even be turned on until next week. She knew the collar cam didn’t even have audio, but Shawn didn’t need to know that. Rebecca secretly loved the fact that Shawn was finally have to work for a living. He usually lived such a carefree life with his shape shifting ability.

Rebecca looked at her watch and tried to look rushed, “We only have a few minutes! The recordings are going to start soon! Once they start, everything will be recorded! You aren’t going to be able to shape shift during the days. And I’m going to have to talk to you like a normal dog ok? We cant have conversations like we normally do. You are going to have to act as much as a normal dog as possible! No reading or watching TV either. Your POV is going to be recorded and it will look bad if you do any human stuff!”

Shawn was furious, “I can’t believe this? I’m not even due for another week or 2? I have to stay 100 percent Sasha until then?”

Rebecca lied, “I’m guessing you never read the contract did you? If you did, you would have known recording was starting this early. It’s too late now. You cant be caught reading anything.”

Rebecca then pointed to the kennel, “I’m sorry about the whole kennel thing too. I honestly didn’t realize they were going to bring such a sophisticated piece of equipment here with all those cameras. Unfortunately, you are going to have to spend the nights sleeping in there and the days inside while I’m at work.“

Shawn’s ears perked up, “Whoa whoa whoa! 8 hours at night? And 8 hours while you are at work? That’s practically the entire day!”

Rebecca tied to give the best pity face she could, “I’m sorry Shawn. But you should feel lucky that you haven’t had to spend more time inside that thing. It’s apartment policy that dogs stay kenneled while owners are away. You should be fortunate you haven’t had to do that this whole time!”

Shawn rolled his eyes, “That’s because I’m not really a DOG! I don’t need to be kenneled all day. I’m not going to eat the furniture or bark all day out the window!”

Rebecca looked at her watch and said, “Uh oh! They are almost ready to start! You need to shape shift back to 100 percent Sasha!”

Shawn gave a disappointing look, “Once this stupid pregnancy is over and I shape shift back to normal, I am NEVER turning into a dog again! This is BS! I’d rather be anything than a pregnant dog right now! I’d even spend a year filming a movie as a woman or even a stupid kid any day over dealing with this shit! I can‘t wait until I deliver these damn puppies and end this!“

Shawn quickly shape shifted into Sasha and Rebecca attached the collar. Rebecca pet Shawn on the back and said, “Don’t forget! From now on I am going to have to talk to you like a normal dog! Try not to act so human ok?” Shawn nodded his head and Rebecca continued, “Oh..and one more thing. The contract doesn’t end after the birth. There is a follow-on week of the documentary seeing how you interact with your new puppies. I wanted you to know now before you found out later.”

Shawn growled at Rebecca hearing about the added week after giving birth. Shawn curled up on the floor with another growl.

Rebecca leaned back on the couch with a grin. She only slightly felt bad about lying to Shawn. But since Shawn thought the collar cam had audio, it would be much easier to relax at home. She wouldn’t have to listen to Shawn’s constant complaining about his situation. Rebecca would have 3 or 4 weeks of her normal life back. With Shawn forced to pretend to be a real dog, Rebecca was going to take advantage of the situation!
143132211212212121122211111.title: Rebecca lies to Shawn

1431322112122121211222111112.content:
It took some adjusting to the new living arrangement, but Shawn decided the best thing to do was to stay as professional as he could during the filming of the documentary. Being stuck in a kennel for practically 16 hours a day was boring for Shawn. Because he was stuck with his lower body as Sasha until the litter was born, Shawn figured it was nice to make some money out of the situation. He would have liked to be able to shapeshift his upper body into a human during the day so he could watch TV and surf the internet. But now that the documentary was being filmed constantly, he had to submit to being 100% Sasha all the time. The highlight of his day was when Becca came home from work. She would take him on a walk and he got to spend the evenings out of the kennel. Becca had started a new routine of making Shawn do tricks. Having to keep up appearances for the filming, Shawn tried his best to act like a normal dog. Shawn liked the treats so he didn’t mind obeying Becca’s commands. He was careful not to stare at TV when Becca watched it. Shawn also had his own fun and would sometimes act like a bad dog and jump on the furniture. Usually when Becca threatened the shock collar, Shawn would stop acting up.

Becca was loving the temporary living arrangement. She of course lied to Shawn about when the filming began. Shawn had thought the filming started a week ago. With Shawn stuck as 100% Sasha all the time, Becca was getting used to having a real dog around the house. It was a little payback for Shawn having such a carefree life. For once, Shawn would have to work harder for his money. Becca considered keeping one of the puppies after they were born. She figured after Shawn shapeshifted back to normal, it would be nice for him to come over to her apartment and see one of the puppies he gave birth to.

After 2 weeks of Shawn being 100% Sasha, Becca was at work and got a phone call. The producer of the documentary had been monitoring the ‘collar cam’ and the other cameras inside Sasha’s kennel. The producer told Becca, “Sasha is starting to give birth!”

When Becca woke up the following morning, there were 6 puppies all snuggled up to Sasha. Sasha was resting after being up all night giving birth. Becca reached in the kennel to pick up one of the puppies and Sasha growled. Becca laughed, “I forgot how protective a mother can be!”

For the following 2 weeks, Shawn had to stay 100% Sasha until the filming contract ran out. Finally, after all the cameras and the ‘collar cam’ were taken away, Shawn could finally shapeshift.
