Becca took the money from the producer and went into her bedroom. She counted the money and split it up accordingly. She took extra money this time from her ‘agent cut’ because of all the extra costs associated with having a real dog for a month. Becca went back into the living room and was surprised that Shawn was still Sasha. Becca laughed, “Wow Shawn? I would have thought you’d shapeshift immediately back to human after the filming crew left?”

Shawn pawed at his collar and Becca remembered that Shawn’s shapeshifting powers didn’t work when he was wearing the shock collar. Becca smiled, “Oopsie!” Becca bent down to take off the collar and paused for a moment to pet Sasha, “I’m going to miss having you around girl! I was actually enjoying having a dog again!” Becca then grinned, “Before I take off your collar so you can shapeshift…How about a few more tricks first?...You know…For old times sake?”

Shawn growled at Becca. He was eager to become human again and Becca was procrastinating. Shawn barked at Becca loudly to show his anger. Becca giggled, “Oh relax Shawn! After spending a month as a dog, a few more seconds wont hurt!” Becca grabbed the dog treats and told Shawn to “Roll over!”

Shawn didn’t budge as he just stared at Becca. Becca laughed, “Come on Shawn! I know how much you like these! Even though you are trying to pout, your tail is wagging back and forth! I know you cant resist these!”

Shawn looked behind to realize Becca was right. His tail was instinctively wagging eager to eat the treats. Knowing Becca wouldn’t let up until she had her fun, Shawn decided to roll over. Becca gave Shawn the treat and giggled, “Good girl!”

After a few more tricks, Becca took the shock collar off so Shawn had his shapeshifting ability back.
1431322112122121211222111112.title: Shawn adjusting to being 100% Sasha

choices: Becca tells Shawn his new role
Becca doesnt have a role lined up for Shawn
14313221121221212112221111122.content:
Shawn used his shapeshifting ability and was human again. He spoke outlout, “Ahhhh! It’s nice to be able to talk again!....Even if its with YOUR voice Becca!”

Becca looked at her naked twin standing there and sighed, “Shawn??!! What the hell? You know I hate it when you shapeshift into ME!”

Shawn explained, “I don’t have any of my clothes here. I’m going to have to borrow some of yours so I can walk home.”

Becca rolled her eyes, “Whatever…just promise me you will shapeshift out of my body as soon as you get home!”

Becca followed her naked twin into her bedroom to get some clothes. Shawn put on a pair of Becca’s panties and joked, “Wow? These are a bit tight? Are these yours?”

Becca shook her head embarrassingly, “Yes they are mine! I’ve put on a few pounds this year. You might want to grab a bigger pair..”

Shawn patted the back of his butt and jiggled it laughing, “Wow. You are right. This feels different from last time I shapeshifted into you. I didn’t even realize you packed on a few pounds.”

Becca was furious, “Ugh! That’s why I hate it when you shapeshift into me! Hurry up and get dressed!”

Shawn reached into Becca’s closet to grab a sundress. Becca shook her head embaressed again, “Umm…You may want to choose something else….I haven’t fit into that dress in years…”

Shawn pulled the dress over anyways. It was tight and not very flattering for Becca’s body. Using his shapeshifting powers, Shawn made his body fit perfectly into the dress and had Becca’s figure from a few years ago. Shawn spun around and said, “Ta-da!”

Becca groaned and mumbled, “Ugh!!! It must be nice to have shapeshifting powers!”

Shawn grabbed a pair of Becca’s heels and began walking out the door. He asked, “So? What’s my next acting gig anyways?
14313221121221212112221111122.title: Shawn shapeshifts into Becca

choices: trying and failing to turn Becca back
143132211212212121122211111221.content:
"Well since things worked out so well, when you were Sacha, I got you another gig as a heroic greyhound!" revealed Becca. "No." replied Shawn. "Shawn, we really..." "I said no! No more non-human roles again, Becca. I mean it! After what happened to me as a dog, never again!" replied Shawn, firmly.

"Shawn..." began Becca, soothingly, taking her doppleganger's hand. "No, Becca! That was horrible! Changing into a non-human damages you. It takes energy and time and wearies you. And worse of all, I got raped! Don't you care at all?" responded Shawn, pulling his hand away.

"Shawn, of course I care! I know it was horrible for you to go through that! And if I could get you a human job, I would! But we can't afford to be picky! Could you try it again and I swear I will be more careful with you!" she promised. Shawn took Becca's hand and to Becca's horror, began to cry.

"Shawn! Oh Shawn, don't cry!" pleaded Becca, shocked by this development. "I hated being a dog! Being shocked, being treated like a toy not a person. And giving birth hurt so bad, even my powers couldn't blunt it! Plus I developed maternal instincts, it was so terrible!" bawled Shawn.

Becca hadn't thought about how bad it would be for Shawn. All that amusement at her cousin's experience turned to severe guilt. It hadn't occurred to her that Shawn could actually be suffering. Genuinely enduring cruel pain. "I just can't do it! Can't you cancel it or say the dog can't make it or something?" pleaded Shawn.

Becca shook her head. "I'm sorry! The reputation of our company is as always at stake, to pull out would cause us to lose a ton of money! I really am..." "How would you like it, if you were the dog? Forced into pregnancy, electrocuted by your cousin or treated like a toy? How would...."

Becca started screaming as her hands starting burning. Her legs felt like they were being cut up. Her world was changing, going grey. "Becca!" screamed Shawn, before it was over. "B-Becca?" stammered Shawn as he stared at the greyhound before him. Becca tried to say "What happened?"; but a bark came out. Shawn gulped before....
143132211212212121122211111221.title: Becca tells Shawn his new role

choices: It works, Shawn can still shapeshift
It doesnt work, Shawn can't shapeshift
1431322112122121211222111112213.content:
Shawn grinned in amazement at what just happened. For some reason, Becca shapeshifted into the greyhound leaving Shawn still in Becca’s body. Becca was just as surprised at suddenly becoming a dog. Becca quickly ran to the mirror and let out a whimper seeing her new appearance.

Shawn walked up behind her and pet her, “Isn’t this ironic cousin Becca? It looks like the tides have turned? Since I’m in your body…That makes ME the agent and you actor now!” Shawn laughed as Becca still was in shock examining her canine body. Shawn got an evil grin and said, "Hmm,..Let's see how you like this thing!"

Shawn grabbed the shock collar and put it snug around Becca's neck. Shawn held up the remote and mocked Becca, "Now be a good girl and don't make me use this!....."

Becca looked up at Shawn with a scared look in her eye.

Shawn then wondered how this happened? Was he able to project his shapeshifting ability onto another person? He had never tried this before and wondered if he had this power all along. On the second thought, he got worried that maybe his shapeshifting power was transferred to Becca? That would mean that Becca had shapeshifting powers now! Of course, with the shock collar on, her powers were rendered useless. Shawn wondered if he still have the ability to shapeshift?


Even if Becca somehow took over the ability to shapeshift, she wouldnt be able to experiment with the shock collar on. There was only one way to find out if Shawn still had his shapeshifting ability. Shawn concentrated on using his shapeshifting power and…..
1431322112122121211222111112213.title: smiling at this unexpected development

choices: Test his new shapeshifting powers on Becca
14313221121221212112221111122131.content:
As Becca was examining her new canine body, Shawn decided to test his shapeshifting abilities. Shawn ran to the bathroom mirror and stared at Becca’s reflection. He concentrated on his shapeshifting ability and changed his hair to red. “Thank goodness!” Shawn thought to himself realizing he still had shapeshifting ability. Just to make sure, he gave himself larger breasts and changed his skin tone several times. Satisfied that he still retained his ability, Shawn turned himself back into Becca. Shawn wondered how this happened. Something involved with giving birth must have enhanced his shapeshifting ability. Now he could shapeshift other people too!

Shawn then noticed an old schedule on the countertop from the documentary producer. Shawn read it and was surprised, “….I can’t believe this? According to this schedule..They didn’t even start filming until the birth?” Shawn remembered how Becca was adamant about Shawn staying 100% Sasha for 2 weeks before the birth. Additionally, they didn’t film anything else until today. It was the follow-up filming session to see how the puppies were doing. That meant that Becca lied to him and tricked Shawn into being a dog for almost a month.

Shawn decided to……….
14313221121221212112221111122131.title: It works, Shawn can still shapeshift

143132211212212121122211111221311.content:
Shawn went back out to check on Becca. She was walking around in her new greyhound body still wondering what was going on. Shawn took the shock collar off and shapeshifted Becca. Now Becca had the body of a greyhound with her normal human head. Becca quickly realized she could talk again and immediately screamed, “AHHHH! What the heck is going on? Turn me back to normal!”

Shawn settled her down, “Relax Becca! I’m still trying to figure this out..” Shawn took the opportunity to get a little revenge after being stuck as Sasha for a month. Shawn lied to Becca, “Something happened with my shapeshifting powers….It seems like I can’t shapeshift my own body anymore. I can only project my shapeshifting powers onto you..”

Becca seemed slightly relieved, “Ok..Whatever? So shapeshift me back to normal!”

Shawn grinned, “Not so fast cousin. Until I figure out how to get my shapeshifting powers back, you realize this means I am stuck as YOU right? If I turn you back to normal, there will be 2 of you walking around.”

Becca didn’t seem to mind, “I don’t care if there are 2 of me! We can just tell people you are my twin or something!” Becca walked around on all fours with her human head to the other side of the room, “Come on Shawn! Turn my lower body back to normal! You have no idea how embarrassing this feels to have a dog’s body!”

Shawn sighed, “Oh really? Did you forget that I spent the past month as dog?”

Becaa retorted, “That’s because it was your job! I lined up that gig so you could make some money!”

Shawn added, “And yourself some money! I’ve been your only client for quite some time! If I’m not working, that means you aren’t earning any money either!” Shawn gave an evil grin to his cousin and said, “….It looks like we are going to have to swap roles for time being. That means you will be shapeshifting into whatever role is next!”

Becca’s eyes got wide as she realized, “Uh oh..The next role I lined up is that Greyhound stunt job starting today!….” Becca panicked, “Give me my cell phone so I can call the producer and cancel!”

Shawn giggled, “I don’t think so Becca! Like you said yourself, we need the money! Maybe with ME being the agent, I will be better at lining up human roles!”

Becca got defensive, “Do you seriously think you could be a better agent than me? You have no idea what goes into networking and lining up roles!”

The two started arguing back and forth when Becca’s cell phone vibrated. It was the producer of the new Greyhound stunt role. The text read, “Where are you? Filming starts in an hour!”

Shawn quickly typed back, “Running late…Be there in 10!”

Shawn then used his shapeshifting power and turned Becca’s head back to the greyhound’s head. With Becca once again 100% dog, she whimpered at her loss of talking ability. Shawn pet her back, “Come on! We need to get going!” Shawn clipped the collar and leash on her. Shawn grabbed Becca’s purse and they headed to the gig.
143132211212212121122211111221311.title: Get revenge on Becca

choices: Be a dog, the preganacy will be over quicker
14313221121221212112222.content:
"Crap!" Shawn yelled as cereal hit the floor. Things hadn't been going great for Shawn. Sure he was no long 100% dog and had his head, hands, and feet, but life still really sucked. He was sleeping the Rebecca's guest room, but because the door automatically shut hard he'd have to knock on the door and yell for his cousin to let him out for food and if he had to go to the bathroom, and unfortunately as a towel that was now at the dumb could attest Rebecca didn't always make it in time. Speaking of the bathroom for the first few tries Shawn tried his hardest to maneuver himself so that he could go in the toilet, but after no any success Rebecca put her foot down and told him he'd have to be 100% Sasha and she'd take him out on a leash to the corner. And today what was ticking off Shawn was due to not being able to bend his arms correctly he constantly found himself knocking off dishes, bowls, and cups from the dinner table. Rebecca had tried to convince him to just eat out of a bowl on the floor, but Shawn would have none of that. He'd make his way onto a chair and lean awkwardly over table and tried to shovel food into his mouth with the silverware. But what Shawn thought was the worst is that since he was sharing a place with Rebecca she had control of the television most of the time and to say that he didn't share a taste in tv and movies was an understatement.

"Shawn!" Rebecca hissed from the couch, "Stop being so loud, I'm tired of getting noise complaints from neighbors about your outbursts. I know that some of them notice that the distinctly male human voice isn't coming from me and it can't be coming from my dog."

"I'm not your damn dog. I'm your cousin"

"Not according to my landlord who is being kind enough to let you stay while I'm 'dog sitting' even though I'm not supposed to have pets."

"Maybe you should stop giving me things to yell about!"

"Like what?!"

"First and foremost is the stupid taste you have in tv. I mean soap operas? Daytime talk shows? What are you 60?"

"I'm sorry, I like having something on in the background as I try to work."

"Then what about the stuff you watch in the afternoon for fun? Those stupid wedding dress shows, half of them knocked up. And speaking of knocked up, you actually watch those stupid teenage mother reality shows. I mean half of the girls on that show aren't girls. They're adult women with boob jobs who got knocked up to start an acting career. And don't even get me started on your taste in late night tv."

"Shawn!" Rebecca said with her eyes wide.

"What? Did somebody see me or something?" Shawn said as he walked up to the door and looked in the small window at the top to make sure nobody looking in and saw him. "No coast is clear, jeez Becca you scared the crap out of me."

Rebecca still was in shock, "How have you not noticed you dolt. Look down."

Shawn did look down and for the first time in forever he saw that he had legs and arms and long blonde hair breasts and a pregnant belly. Well, those last three things are still not normal for him, but he was human again! "YES!" Shawn screamed in a soprano voice. "I guess I just needed a massive recharge. Now time to get back to being me." Shawn once again tried to become Shawn, but nothing changed outside of his head. "Crap," His again masculine voice said.

"I've got an idea," Rebecca said thoughtfully, "Try turning back into Sasha." Shawn obliged and sure enough he was able to turn into Sasha no problem. Confused Shawn concentrated and went back to the pregnant blonde form he was just second before. "It looks like you always had your shifting power, you just couldn't do anything to destroy the babies."

"So I can be human, but I just have to be a pregnant lady. Just great" Shawn said grumpily. "Well this is better than being a dog/human hybrid. I'll just stay this way until I'm about to burst and turn back into Sasha to give birth and then I should be able to go back to normal."

"But judging by how pregnant you are as a human, I'd bet that it would add a at least a month to the pregnancy, the gestation will take longer as a human. So if you want to get back to being you sooner, I'm sorry but I'd recommend you go back to your Sasha like form."

"Maybe, but being like that really really sucks. I can barely stand it, it's driving me nuts."

"And you think just because you're human having about...let's say at least 6 babies in your belly for a couple of months will be a piece of cake."

The thought of this made the blood drain from Shawn's face, he hadn't factored that in, "Give me a few minutes to decide, but for now," Shawn walked past Rebecca, "You have no idea how long I've waited to go to the bathroom indoors, even if I do have to sit." Shawn sits down on the toilet and begins to seriously think about the decision before him
14313221121221212112222.title: Shawn discovers a pregancy loophole

144.content:
"This is actually a really great opportunity for you. You're going to be expanding your repertoire a bit beyond the usual human and dog stuff that you usually do." Rebecca said continuing to sell Shawn on the job. "Wait, so I'm not going to be a dog? I guess that'll be a nice change of pace I guess if I have to be an animal. But what is it."

Rebecca breathed a sigh of relief that her cousin seemed kind of interested, time to drop the bomb. "Well, the studio I'm in contact with is looking for a highly intelligent animal and I, and by I, I mean you, were recommended for the part of Luci the primate."

Shawn looked at his phone in silence. "You want me to be a monkey. A monkey named Luci."

"The studio wants you to be a highly intelligent primate, and it has to be female, sorry." There was a moment of silence so Rebecca continued to make her case, "Come on Shawn, it'll be fun. I don't think you've ever done a primate before and it'll be much more human than any dumb dog part I'd have gotten you."

"Well...I guess it'll be nice to be able to keep having opposable thumbs..."

"That's right! And you'll be able to just walk around naked and poop wherever you want."

"Geez Becca what kind of animal do you take me for."

"I expect you to be a primate by the time I get to your pigsty of an apartment in about an hour." Shawn looked around his room when he heard his cousin say this. She wasn't exactly wrong about his place being a mess, mainly because he had the clothes of about 30 different people strewn about his apartment. Of course all thirty of those people were just different forms of Shawn but that didn't really leave an excuse for the mess. Rebecca continued on the phone, "I've already got your transportation ready to the set. You start today and the first check is already in your account."

"So glad you're giving me a choice in the matter." Shawn grumbled.

"What can I say, I knew you'd say yes."

"Care to give me the low down on what kind of monkey I need to shapeshift into, I kind of need you to be more specific."

"Oh sorry about that Shawn, my bad. The studio wants you to be a...."
144.title: Not a canine, but a primate

choices: A luxury cage in Sonia's living space
An ugly and nasty cage outdoors
1441.content:
"When I get there Shawn I expect to see the cutest and most photogenic chimpanzee I've ever seen. I've got to go, traffic is starting to get bad. See you in a bit cousin." Rebecca said before she hung up leaving Shawn to ponder his task. Shawn set up some image searches for research and made a microwave pizza to treat himself since he figured it may be a while before he could have human food. As he ate his pizza Shawn studied and memorized how the chimpanzee body was structured. Then when he felt comfortable he set up a bit of a practice round. Removing all his clothes he stood in the middle of his room and started to shift his body about. He grew hair all over his body and shifted his face a bit. In a matter of seconds Shawn looked like a perfect hybrid of himself and a monkey. He looked perfect if they ever made another of those future ape planet movies or whatever they were called.

After admiring his own handiwork for a minute Shawn figured it was time to make the final product and gave himself the proper proportions and shrunk himself down to about 3' 6". He checked a mirror and sure enough Shawn looked exactly like a normal chimpanzee. Shawn took the opportunity to go a bit wild and jumped around his apartment. He jumped on the bed and had a blast for the first time since he was about 5 years old. Then he tarted climbing and hanging all over his furniture. He was beginning to contemplate trying to hang off of the ceiling fan, but the doorbell stopped that probably bad idea from being executed. With his normal voice he called out, "Who is it?"

"It's your cousin/agent, could you let me in please?" Rebecca's said formt he other side of the door. Shawn walked over to the door a little duck footed and opened the door with no problem. Rebecca entered quickly making sure no neighbors could see the chimp in Shawn apartment. "Looking good Shawn, I just have a few notes for you."

"What's wrong? The color?" Shawn said as he turned his black fur blue getting a smile out of Rebecca. "This isn't a space monkey thing so standard black will do. Don't you remember that your character's name will be Luci? Don't you think Luci should be a girl chimp?"

Shawn sighed, "I guess so." And he quickly and quietly made the needed adjustment.

"And I know this should go without saying but could you go ahead and change your voice, we don't want to freak out the rest of the world by bringing them a talking monkey."

"What kind of amateur do you take me for? But if you want me to do it now I will." A second later the next thing that came out of Shawn's mouth was, "Ugh eek ook ook."

Rebecca smiled, "Thank you Shawn. Now lets get you to the set. We have a meeting and make sure you're on your best behavior."

__________________________

One very awkward ride later where Shawn had to stay in the back of an enclosed truck in a cage, Rebecca was wheeling her shapeshifting cousin onto the studio lot where a middle aged man and a young black haired Hispanic woman seemed to be waiting for them. Rebecca started her wheeling and dealing, she introduced herself and 'Luci' to the man who it turns out is the director, Trevor Robins, and the woman was the animal trainer Sonia Nunez. For the first time in his life Shawn was kind of glad he didn't have his manhood because if he'd had it the whole world would be able to tell that he was very attracted to Sonia. He liked the idea that he'd be spending a whole lot of time with her on this shoot but really hated the idea of being a monkey.

Trevor looked at you and said, "Well she certainly looks good and healthy, but is she smart enough for this, can she be trained for being on film?"

Sonia squatted down to look you in the eye and said, "Let's test her out." And began making motions with her hands. In a moment of panic shared between you and Rebecca at the moment you realized she was trying to talk to you with sign language. Rebecca quickly stepped in, "Luci doesn't know sign language I'm afraid, but she does know English very well."

Sonia looked skeptically at Rebecca and said, "I'll be the judge of that." Turning back to you she softly and sweetly said, "Luci?" You made sure she understood that you understood her. "Luci I'd like to be your friend, I'm going to offer you my hand."

Trevor looked nervous, "Is that safe Sonia?"

"If Luci is trained it is, we're about to find out." Sonia held out her hand and smiling you took it and put your lips to it and gave it a kiss. Sonia smiled, "Well she certainly is sweet, I think I can work with her."

"That's great news, Miss Perry let's finalize the contract and let these two get to know each other better. Trevor and Rebecca went off into some building while Sonia wheeled you over to your home for the time being.
1441.title: Enter the Chimp

choices: Shawn shapeshifts back into his normal form
Shawn turns into a woman Sonia's age to give her a gal pal
14412.content:
As Shawn's cousin/manager Rebecca left with director Trevor to finalize the paperwork, Sonia began wheeling his cage away. "While those two do the boring stuff, how about I get to know you better before you get to work, okay Luci?" Sonia said in a slightly cutesy voice. Curious about his new living space, Shawn grabbed the bars of the cage and pressed his rubbery face against it to see if you could get a good look at wherever you were going. Sonia saw this and smiled, "Have some patience Luci, we're almost there. You'll be rooming with me miss big star." Shawn were very surprised with this. In every other animal stunt job he'd gotten he was always just put in dirty cages with a bunch of (other) animals. It was usually awful because not only was the smell awful but if he was a female like he was now Shawn would have to fight off any males with a stick (or a shapeshifted chainsaw arm).

In a matter of minutes Shawn were taken to a very large trailer, well more like a very nice mobile home. The inside of it looked like it had been lived in for months. With his monkey senses Shawn could tell that he weren't the first monkey to live here, but the first in about a month. And it also looked and smelled like Sonia was the only human who was ever here. Sonia let Shawn out of his cage and pointed him to a little play area she had set up where her closet should be. Inside were a series of toys and pictures you would normally associate with toddlers but soon realized that they were for him and Sonia definitely didn't have a child that they could be for.

Sonia began to encourage 'Luci' to play with them. She seemed to be gauging how intelligent Shawn was. Not wanting to seem like dumb and replaceable he made sure to fit all the square pegs in the square holes and pointing out shapes when Sonia told him about them. It should have been boring but seeing the joy and intellectual curiosity from Sonia made it enjoyable. But after a while something happened that Shawn didn't expect, Sonia began to cry.

"This is so dumb, this is the most intelligent conversation I've had in about a year and it's with a monkey. No offense Luci. How did I let my life get to this point. I mean I love my job and all but I have all but cut out human contact in my life. I haven't even had a boyfriend since high school. Hell I haven't had a girl my own age to just hang out and get drinks with since college. I'm almost 30 and I'm just going to end up spending all my life talking with animals on crummy movie sets. I just wish I had someone, anyone to just...be a normal woman with."

Shawn was dumbfounded by all this, he had turned into a female monkey for a paycheck and now he was playing amateur chimp psychologist for his trainer. He felt bad for her, but then a rush went to Shawn's head, a similar one to the adrenaline rush he would get from doing stunts. What if he just shapeshifted right now in front of Sonia and gave her the friend she so badly wants, nay, needs. Shawn didn't even think of any other consequences, he wanted to do it and had already decided. The only question now was how risky was he going to be with who he shapeshifted into?
14412.title: Getting to know your trainer Sonia better

Shawn giggled in reply, before shaking his head. "Nope, sadly Luci has no gal at present!" Sonia laughed at that, prompting Shawn to do likewise. "Okay, then, friend! Shall we just watch a movie? Seeing that you are clearly well trained." Luci giggled again. "Well reasonably well trained. After a little liquor, I get a little handsy! Why did I just say that?" Sonia laughed at your self-remonstration. "Movie without liquor, it is!"
